NK084(yu)005:1: // dpal sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i khro bo dam pa rgyan
NK084(yu)005:2: gyi mchan tig he ru ka'i dgongs rgyan ces bya
NK084(yu)005:3: ba bzhugs so // na mas sh+ri badz+ra he ru
NK084(yu)005:4: ka /snying rje'i ngang las rab khros bcom ldan 'das
NK084(yu)005:5: ba bzhugs so // // srid zhi'i spyi dpal rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal //
NK084(yu)005:6: he ru ka dpal 'bar ba chen po la //
NK084(yu)005:7: rab gus dgyes pa'i gar gyis phyag bagyi'o //
NK084(yu)005:8: gang de'i sgrub thabs de nyid snang ba la //
NK084(yu)005:9: dam pa'i rgyan gyur gsang chen zab mo'i gter //
NK084(yu)005:10: bstan bcos chen po mkhas grub zhal lung gi //
NK084(yu)005:11: mchan tig nyung ngu rnam gsal dbye bar bya //
NK084(yu)005:12: de la 'dir dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho
NK084(yu)005:13: na nyid nges pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po khro bo'i
NK084(yu)005:14: dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i bstan bcos
NK084(yu)005:15: chen po de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i
NK084(yu)005:16: rgyan 'di nyid 'chad pa la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)005:20: dang po la mtshan smros pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:21: phyag gis mchod par brjod pa /
NK084(yu)005:22: rtsam par dam bca' ba gsum las /
NK084(yu)005:24: de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa rgyan ces gsungs te /
NK084(yu)005:25: de kho na nyid ces pa rtog tshogs thams cad
NK084(yu)005:26: rang rig pa las mi gzhan pa'i phyir snang stong
NK084(yu)005:27: gnyis med rang byung gi ye shes la sgom byed
NK084(yu)005:28: kyi blo ma bcos par bzhag pa rgyu yi de
NK084(yu)005:30: de sgoms pa las 'bras bu sku dang ye shes
NK084(yu)005:31: rang snang ba 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dam
NK084(yu)005:32: ma nor ba'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK084(yu)005:33: 'bras bu de'ang sgrib byed dag pa'i tshe rang las
NK084(yu)005:34: snang ba las gzhan nas byung ba ma yin pa'i
NK084(yu)005:35: phyir rgyu 'bras kyi dbye ba tsam yang ma grub
NK084(yu)005:36: pas gnyis su med pa'i de kho na nyid do
NK084(yu)005:37: // de lta bu'i rang byung rig pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)005:38: de kho na nyid thun mong min pa'i gtan tshigs
NK084(yu)005:39: chen po rnams kyis gtan la dbab pas don spyi'i
NK084(yu)005:41: snod bcud rgyud rnams dkyil 'khor gsum du sgoms pa
NK084(yu)005:42: sogs kyis rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis mngon sum
NK084(yu)005:43: du snang ba de ni gang zhig bsgom par bya
NK084(yu)005:44: ba thams cad kyi nang nas dam pa'i mchog tu
NK084(yu)005:46: de gtan la dbab byed kyi rgyud thams cad kyi
NK084(yu)005:47: rgyal po gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
NK084(yu)005:48: des pa'i rang byung rig pa khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:49: sgom pa'i rim pa gsal bar byed pa'i rgyan ces
NK084(yu)005:50: bya ba'o // mtshan smos pa'i dgos pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:52: rab la mtshan bstan 'bring la dbye //
NK084(yu)005:54: zhes dbang rab kyis mtshan bstan pas rgyud dang bstan
NK084(yu)005:55: bcos kyi don bde blag tu rtogs pa sogs kyi
NK084(yu)005:57: gnyis pa phyag la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)005:61: dgos pa ni gnyis te yi dam lha la dbang mi za ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:62: bstan chos rtsom pa la bar chad mi yong ba'i dgos pa yod do //
NK084(yu)005:63: bsdus pa'i don la bzhi ste gang zag gang gis btsal /
NK084(yu)005:66: tshul lam thabs ji ltar btsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:67: gang zag ni sngon byung du sangs rgyas gsang bas so //
NK084(yu)005:68: rjes 'jug tu bshad pa po gang yin gyis so //
NK084(yu)005:69: yum ni khrag 'thung khro bo'i lha'o //
NK084(yu)005:70: dgos ched ni rtogs pa don gyi phyag btsal bas
NK084(yu)005:71: mchog gi dngos grub thob la kun rdzob brda'i phyag
NK084(yu)005:72: btsal bas thun mong gi dngos grub thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:73: tshul lam thabs ni gsum ste yi dam don du
NK084(yu)005:74: gnyer ba'i tshul dang gdul bya gus pa bskyed pa'i
NK084(yu)005:75: tshul dang / ya rab dang go bstun pa'i tshul lo //
NK084(yu)005:77: thams cad ngo bo mnyam nyid sku //
NK084(yu)005:78: dbang chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)005:79: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi //
NK084(yu)005:80: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal te //
NK084(yu)005:81: zhes pa rang don chos sku dang sbyar te bshad
NK084(yu)005:82: pa gzhan don gzugs sku dang sbyar te bshad pa
NK084(yu)005:83: / don bcu la sbyar te bshad pa'am yang na
NK084(yu)005:84: dbang po rab nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir sku lnga
NK084(yu)005:85: dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:86: dbang po 'bring nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir na sku gsum dang sbyar te bshad pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:87: dbang po tha ma nges shes bskyed pa'i phyir na sgra brgyad dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:88: de la rang don chos sku dang sbyar te bshad
NK084(yu)005:89: na thams cad ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las
NK084(yu)005:90: 'das pa dang gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum gyis bsdus
NK084(yu)005:92: ngo bo de'i rang bzhin te sems nyid 'od gsal lo //
NK084(yu)005:93: de ni chos nyid byang chub kyi sems rang snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:94: mnyam nyid ni chos kyi sku'o //
NK084(yu)005:95: de ni rang don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:96: bde chen ni chos sku de las gdul bya'i don
NK084(yu)005:97: du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yab yum thabs dang
NK084(yu)005:98: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i ngang las dus thams
NK084(yu)005:99: cad du 'du 'bral med par bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:100: de yang bde ba mi zad pa dang bde ba
NK084(yu)005:101: che ba dang bde ba gya nom pa dang ldan
NK084(yu)005:102: par ro // gar dbang ni sprul pa'i sku ste
NK084(yu)005:103: gdul bya la dpe gar mkhan lta bus dbang du
NK084(yu)005:104: par ro // sdud pa'o // sprul sku de nyid
NK084(yu)005:105: bshad pa ni sku gsung thugsa yon tan 'phrin las
NK084(yu)005:106: mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi rang bzhin
NK084(yu)005:107: par ro // sdud pa'o // te / de yang
NK084(yu)005:108: sku mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni thub
NK084(yu)005:109: pa drug la sogs pa ste /
NK084(yu)005:111: de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang //
NK084(yu)005:112: yang dag thar ba'i gzugs sku dang //
NK084(yu)005:114: mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston //
NK084(yu)005:116: gsung mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni theg
NK084(yu)005:117: pa rim pa dagu'am chos kyi sgo mo stong phrag
NK084(yu)005:120: thams cad pad+mo'i ngang gyur nas //
NK084(yu)005:121: grol thar lam dang pad+mo'i sgra //
NK084(yu)005:122: ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste //
NK084(yu)005:123: theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //
NK084(yu)005:124: log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad //
NK084(yu)005:126: thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo ni ye
NK084(yu)005:127: shes kyi rol pa sna tshogs par snang ba ste
NK084(yu)005:128: / stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs //
NK084(yu)005:129: dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang bsgyur //
NK084(yu)005:130: ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams las //
NK084(yu)005:131: gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin //
NK084(yu)005:133: de gsum kho na yon tan 'phrin las kyang de nyid yin no //
NK084(yu)005:134: de ltar gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa de su
NK084(yu)005:135: yin zhe na he ru ka ste dpal khrag 'thung
NK084(yu)005:136: zhes bya'o // de la sh+ri zhes pa'i sgra'i don
NK084(yu)005:137: ni khong nas 'don pa ste dang po bdag dang
NK084(yu)005:139: he ni he he kri ra tha ste spyod cing
NK084(yu)005:140: brtson pa'i don yin pas na ye shes phun sum
NK084(yu)005:141: tshogs pa'o // ru ni ru ti ra ste khrag go //
NK084(yu)005:142: khrag gi sgra ni spang bya ste nyon mongs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:143: ka ni bdag po'i rkyen te khrag la rol pas
NK084(yu)005:144: na he ru ste spangs pa dang ye shes phun
NK084(yu)005:145: sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ka la bshad
NK084(yu)005:146: pa'o // yang na ka ni ka pa la te thod ba'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:147: de ltar na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba la
NK084(yu)005:148: rol pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan pa'i he ru ka
NK084(yu)005:149: zhes bshad do // yi ge yan lag gi don
NK084(yu)005:150: du bshad na sh+ri ni shugs la yod de ad
NK084(yu)005:151: ma sh+ri na bdag gi dpal lo //
NK084(yu)005:152: he du na rgyu he ru ka don rgyu dbyings la don ye shes dgyes pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:153: ru ra ga na chags pa ru rag ta na khrag chags pas khro bor byung ba'o /
NK084(yu)005:154: ka kar ma na 'phrin las ka ka ru na
NK084(yu)005:155: thugs rje khro bo'i 'phrin las de dag yang snying
NK084(yu)005:156: rjes mnyam snyoms su mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:157: gzhan yang gzung 'dzin gnyis med dang tshad med bzhi
NK084(yu)005:158: dang brda skad drag po dang rnam par thar pa'i
NK084(yu)005:160: de bas na sgra skad sor bzhag ste ma sgyur ba yin no //
NK084(yu)005:161: de ni he ru ka'i don bcu dang sbyar te bshad pa'ang yin no //
NK084(yu)005:162: sku lnga dang sbyar na thams cad mngon par byang
NK084(yu)005:163: chub pa'i sku ngo bo chos sku mnyam nyid rdo
NK084(yu)005:164: rje'i sku bde chen longs sku gar dbang sprul sku
NK084(yu)005:165: he ru ka re re la yang tshang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:167: he ni chos sku mtshan dang bral //
NK084(yu)005:168: ru ni longs sku bde ba che //
NK084(yu)005:169: ka ni mdzad pa sprul pa'i sku //
NK084(yu)005:170: la ni yul du byas pa ste //
NK084(yu)005:171: phyag ni nyon mongs dri ma med //
NK084(yu)005:172: 'tshal zhes de la brjod pa yin //
NK084(yu)005:173: te ni lhag ma yod pa'i tshig /ces so //
NK084(yu)005:174: sgra brgyad dang sbyar na he he ka na dgyes
NK084(yu)005:175: pa ste chos sku he he du na rgyu ste
NK084(yu)005:176: snying rje chen po ste dgyes pa'i snying rje'o //
NK084(yu)005:177: ru ra ga na chags pa ste 'gro ba'i don
NK084(yu)005:178: ru rak+ta na khrag gsol ba ste rdo rja gnod
NK084(yu)005:179: sbyin gyis ru tra'i khrag gsol ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:180: ka ru ni ka ni don dam pa ste byang
NK084(yu)005:181: chub kyi sems ka karma na phrin las mdzad pa
NK084(yu)005:182: kun no // yang he ru gcig byung na dpal
NK084(yu)005:183: gcig rang bzhin gyis shugs la yod de ad+ma sh+ri
NK084(yu)005:184: na rtogs pa bdag gi dpal sa ra sh+ri na
NK084(yu)005:185: thugs rje gzhan gyi dpal lo //
NK084(yu)005:186: gsum pa brtsam par dam bca' ba la gsum ste dgos pa'i don dang /
NK084(yu)005:189: dgos pa ni sems bskyed mi nyams pa'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)005:190: gdul bya don du gnyer ba'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)005:191: bstan chos rtsom pa mthar phyin pa'i dgos pa yod /
NK084(yu)005:192: bsdus don ni gsum ste chos gang bshad na snang ba dam pa rgyan bshad /
NK084(yu)005:193: gang zag gang gis bshad na sangs rgyas gsang bas bshad /
NK084(yu)005:194: thabs ji ltar bshad na phyag btsal dam bcas nas
NK084(yu)005:195: 'gro ba ye shes kyi lus su bya ba'i phyir
NK084(yu)005:196: bshad do // tshig gi don ni /
NK084(yu)005:197: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud dag las //
NK084(yu)005:198: lha yi rnal 'byor rim pa zhig /sems can ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)005:199: legs par bsdus te bstan par bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:201: de la gzhung 'di gang las bsdus na sgyu don
NK084(yu)005:202: dam ste shes rab 'phrul kun rdzob ste thabs d+r+wa
NK084(yu)005:203: ba'i don gnyis med de zung du 'brel ba rgyud
NK084(yu)005:204: lam yi ge'i rgyud dag ngos bzung ba ste gsang
NK084(yu)005:205: snying dang thabs zhags las bsdus pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:206: de yang rgyud ni zhal nas gsungs pa dang cho
NK084(yu)005:207: ga tshang ba dang 'brel chags pa dang dkrugs pa
NK084(yu)005:208: dang mngon par 'dus pas na rgyud do //
NK084(yu)005:209: de yang sgyu 'phrul gsum las rdo rje sems dpa'
NK084(yu)005:210: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud las gsang snying las so
NK084(yu)005:211: // gang bsdus na rang bzhin lhun grub gzhi'i lha dang /
NK084(yu)005:212: nye bar bsnyen pa brtags pa lam gyi lha dang /
NK084(yu)005:213: rtogs pa mngon gyur 'bras bu yi lha dang gsum
NK084(yu)005:214: dbyer med par lam gyi rnala 'byor pas rten dang
NK084(yu)005:215: brten bcas go rim bzhin du sgom pa'i rim pa
NK084(yu)005:216: zhig ste lam gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi don
NK084(yu)005:217: du dpal he ru ka sgom pa dang 'phrin las
NK084(yu)005:218: kyi rim pa bzhin du bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:219: dgos ched ci phyir bsdus na tshogs brgyad dang ldan
NK084(yu)005:220: pa'i sems can te ye nas ye shes lnga'i rang
NK084(yu)005:221: bzhin yin pa la yin par ma shes pa de
NK084(yu)005:222: ye shes lngar bskyed pa'i phyir ram sems can rnams
NK084(yu)005:223: la ni gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs nas ye
NK084(yu)005:224: shes kyi snang ba ma skyes pa la ye shes
NK084(yu)005:225: bskyed pa'i phyir / ji ltar bsdus na tshig tu
NK084(yu)005:226: mi mang don du mi nyung bar legs par bsdus
NK084(yu)005:227: te ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnams la bstan par
NK084(yu)005:228: bskyed pa'i phyir / bya'o // de yang man ngag
NK084(yu)005:229: 'di slob dpon gyis 'phrin las su ma tshang ba
NK084(yu)005:230: med par le'u bco lnga pa la sogs pa nas
NK084(yu)005:231: bskyed pa'i phyir / bya'o // bsdus pa'o // yang gang gis bsdus na sangs rgyas gsang bas so //
NK084(yu)005:232: gang nas bsdus na gsang snying las so //
NK084(yu)005:233: ci'i phyir bsdus na sems can ye shes bskyed phyir ro //
NK084(yu)005:234: gang bsdus na sgrub thabs 'di nyid do //
NK084(yu)005:235: gnyis pa gzhung don la dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:238: rgyud nyan pa la sogs pa'i sngon du dbang bskur nod dgos par bstan pa /
NK084(yu)005:239: rgyud don mtshon par byed pa'i sgo bstan pa /
NK084(yu)005:240: rgyud kyi che ba brjod pa /
NK084(yu)005:241: des na snod ldan pa la ston par gdams pa /
NK084(yu)005:242: snod ngan la byin pa'i skyon bstan pa /
NK084(yu)005:243: mchog thun gyi dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu sems 'dul bar bstan pa /
NK084(yu)005:244: gang du sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:246: slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK084(yu)005:247: dbang rnams thob par ma byas na //
NK084(yu)005:248: nyan pa la sogs brtson pa rnams //
NK084(yu)005:251: spyir slob dpon drug las man ngag lung gi slob
NK084(yu)005:252: dpon dang dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon dag phyi
NK084(yu)005:253: sgo gsum gyis mnyes par byas te zang zing dbul
NK084(yu)005:254: / nang sgrub pas mnyes par bya ste slob ma snod bzang po'o //
NK084(yu)005:255: de la mnyes pa'i rkyen gyis ci zhe na dbang
NK084(yu)005:256: rnams legs par thob par 'gyur la gal te slob
NK084(yu)005:257: dpon mnyes par ma byas shing /
NK084(yu)005:258: phyi phan pa'i dbang bcu lus la bskur ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:259: nang nus pa'i dbang lnga sems la bskur ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:260: gsang ba zab mo'i dbang gsum rig pa la bslab
NK084(yu)005:261: pa dang dbang bco brgyad po rnams slob mas thob
NK084(yu)005:263: dbang de dag ma thob par rang nyan pa dang
NK084(yu)005:264: la sogs pa'i khong nas gzhan la 'chad pa dang
NK084(yu)005:265: lha sgom zhing sgrub pa dang 'phrin las dang rdo
NK084(yu)005:266: rje slob dpon gyi sa bzung nas de'i bya ba
NK084(yu)005:267: byed cing brtson pa rnams de dag gi 'bras bu
NK084(yu)005:268: mchog dang thun mong gi 'bras bu med cing pha
NK084(yu)005:269: rol tu slar ngan song gi gnas su rang rgyud
NK084(yu)005:270: brlag par 'gyur bas na bla ma mnyes shing phyi
NK084(yu)005:271: nang gi dbang rnams thob par byas nas sdod nyan
NK084(yu)005:272: pa la sogs pa la brtson par bya'o zhe'o //
NK084(yu)005:273: de bas na gong ma de dag las ldog ste bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:275: yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la //
NK084(yu)005:276: brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te //
NK084(yu)005:277: khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa //
NK084(yu)005:278: ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas //
NK084(yu)005:280: de yang gang gis mtshon na yi ge a li
NK084(yu)005:281: ka li gnyis la gi gu 'greng bu na ro'i
NK084(yu)005:282: sgra btags nas tsheg shad kyis phye ba ni yi
NK084(yu)005:283: ge'i tshogs las sgra 'byung sgra 'dus pa las ming
NK084(yu)005:284: gi tshogs byung la ming 'dus pa la brten pa'i
NK084(yu)005:286: ji ltar mtshon na tshig la brten nas don mtshon
NK084(yu)005:287: par byed de tshig gi sgron mes don gyi gser
NK084(yu)005:288: mtshon pa ni don gab pa mun pa'i rdzas dang
NK084(yu)005:289: 'dra tshig gis rab tu mtshon te gsal ba ni
NK084(yu)005:290: sgron me dang 'dra ba yin no //
NK084(yu)005:291: des gang mtshon par byed ce na khong nas gab
NK084(yu)005:292: sbas zhes pa gzhi rang bzhin gyi rgyud la gab
NK084(yu)005:293: pa kun tu bzang pos 'byin la lam rkyen gyi
NK084(yu)005:294: rgyud la sbas pa'i don slob dpon gyis 'byin pa
NK084(yu)005:295: yin no // de yang gzhi rang bzhin gyi rgyud
NK084(yu)005:296: la gab pa sems nyid yin te khong na gab
NK084(yu)005:297: yin no // / de ston pa'i gdams ngag lam
NK084(yu)005:298: rkyen gyi rgyud yin te yi ge'i ris su sbas
NK084(yu)005:299: yin no // / so // tshig dang yi ge'i
NK084(yu)005:300: rgyud de yang dkyus la gab ste brda chod dang
NK084(yu)005:301: gzu lum byed pa rnams kyi don du rgyud dkrugs
NK084(yu)005:302: yin no // / so // pa'o // dkrugs pa
NK084(yu)005:303: de'i don 'dir phyin ci ma log par bsdus nas
NK084(yu)005:304: yin no // / so // pa'o // ston no
NK084(yu)005:305: // de 'byin pa'i khungs gang la thug na ston
NK084(yu)005:306: pa kun tu bzang po rgyud ston pa'i bdag nyid
NK084(yu)005:307: dam dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rgyud 'chad pa'i skyes
NK084(yu)005:308: bu'am slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba bstan bcos rtsom
NK084(yu)005:309: pa'i mkhan po gsum gyi thugsa la gab pa ni
NK084(yu)005:310: de lta bur gnas shing rags las pas na slob
NK084(yu)005:311: dpon mnyes par bya dgos pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:312: de yang don te gang la yod na ston pa rdo rje sogs kyi ston la /
NK084(yu)005:313: gang gis 'byin pa ni khong nas gab sbas sogs
NK084(yu)005:314: dang 'byin pa la ci dgos brten pa'i tshig sogs
NK084(yu)005:315: dang dgos pa de gang gis 'grub zhe na yi
NK084(yu)005:316: ge sgra btags sogs kyis ston no //
NK084(yu)005:318: 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:319: 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin //
NK084(yu)005:320: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
NK084(yu)005:321: 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med //
NK084(yu)005:322: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyed do //
NK084(yu)005:323: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i rgyu //
NK084(yu)005:325: rgyud gsang ba snying po'i man ngag 'di ni gsang
NK084(yu)005:326: ba chena po bzhis chod pa'i gang zag grol ba'i
NK084(yu)005:327: phyir gsungs pas drang don ma yin pas nges pa'i
NK084(yu)005:328: don gyi man ngag 'di blo dman pas mi rtogs
NK084(yu)005:329: te shin tu zab pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)005:330: 'di ni nges pa'i don phyin ci ma log pa
NK084(yu)005:331: ston pa ste de yang da ltar rgyu'i dus 'di
NK084(yu)005:332: nyid na 'bras bu sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil
NK084(yu)005:333: 'khor du sangs rgyas par ston te de yi don
NK084(yu)005:334: rtogs nas de nyid lam du phyin pa'i phyir ro
NK084(yu)005:335: // 'bras bu ni rgyal po'i phru gru'am shing sna'i
NK084(yu)005:336: me dang 'dra la lam du gyur pa ni rgyu
NK084(yu)005:337: 'bras gnyis med pa yin pas so //
NK084(yu)005:338: de bas na 'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa zhes pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:339: thob bya 'di nyid yin pas 'di la 'bad par bstan no //
NK084(yu)005:340: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma
NK084(yu)005:341: lus pa la yang man ngag 'di las ma gtogs
NK084(yu)005:342: pa'i dgos pa med de rgyal ba ni 'khor ba
NK084(yu)005:343: las so dkyil ni badz+ra he ru ka'o 'khor ni
NK084(yu)005:344: rigs bzhi'i he ru ka'o ma lus pa ni lhag
NK084(yu)005:346: rgyal ba thams cad kyang man ngag 'di las byung
NK084(yu)005:347: ba dang de'i ngang la bzhugs pa'i phyir dang 'di
NK084(yu)005:348: las lhag pa'i gsang ba'i nges don gzhan med de
NK084(yu)005:349: man ngag 'di nyid las mi 'da' ba yin no
NK084(yu)005:350: // mi la sogs pa gzhan gyis btsal kyang lta
NK084(yu)005:351: ci smos te 'di las lhag pa rgyal ba'i dkyil
NK084(yu)005:352: 'khor dang bcas pas kyang mi rnyed do //
NK084(yu)005:353: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi phyag rgya ni yab
NK084(yu)005:354: phyag rgya chen po yum dam tshig gi phyag rgya
NK084(yu)005:355: gnyis med chos kyi phyag rgya 'phro 'du las kyi
NK084(yu)005:356: phyag rgya de las mi 'da' bas na phyag rgya
NK084(yu)005:357: de lta bu'i dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med
NK084(yu)005:358: pa thob cing bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na 'di
NK084(yu)005:360: thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
NK084(yu)005:361: shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis zungs //
NK084(yu)005:362: snod ldan dang tshul bzang la bstan //
NK084(yu)005:363: lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin //
NK084(yu)005:365: de yang thos pa'i shes rab kyi dus su snod
NK084(yu)005:366: kha sbub kyi skyon spang bsam pa'i dus su zhabs
NK084(yu)005:367: rdol spang sgom pa'i dus su dug can spang de
NK084(yu)005:368: lta ba'i rang gi shes rgyud sbyang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:369: 'di'i don 'dod pa'i gang zag ni thun mong gi
NK084(yu)005:370: theg pa la sngon du blo rab tu sbyangsa pa
NK084(yu)005:371: byas pa'i gang zag gcig dgos pa'o zhes sbyangs pas
NK084(yu)005:373: de ltar sngon du blo sbyangs pas sgrib pa thams
NK084(yu)005:374: cad dag nas blo rno bar gyur pa des 'di
NK084(yu)005:375: rtogs pas na shes rab kyi mig ldan nam spyan
NK084(yu)005:376: dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'di zungsa shig ces sbyin
NK084(yu)005:377: pa'i snod bstan / gzhan sbyangs pa sngon du ma
NK084(yu)005:378: song ba dang blo dman pas 'di'i don mi rtogs
NK084(yu)005:379: pas bstan par mi bya ba'i phyir na snod dang
NK084(yu)005:380: ldan pa ni skyon med pa ste ldan pa chu
NK084(yu)005:381: srin gre ba dang 'dra ste man ngag gsang thub
NK084(yu)005:382: pa ngang ring ba chu bo'i rgyun lta bu ste
NK084(yu)005:383: rdo rje slob dpon dang mched lcam dral dang sems
NK084(yu)005:384: la khong khro ba med pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:385: tshul shis pa dge slong gsar pa lta bu ste sgo gsum skyon gyis ma gos pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:386: rang bzhin bzang ba gser lta bu ste thams cad
NK084(yu)005:387: du phyogs ris mi 'byed pa'i snying rje chen po
NK084(yu)005:388: dang ldan pa ste kun la khyab pa nyi ma
NK084(yu)005:389: lta bu dang / blo brtan pa ri bo lta
NK084(yu)005:390: bu ste rdo rje theg pa 'di'i sgor zhugs nas
NK084(yu)005:391: mdo sde logs su mi ldon par rigs brtan zhing
NK084(yu)005:392: mi 'gyur ba'o zhes rang bzhin gyis snod du rung
NK084(yu)005:393: lta bu dang / bar bstan no // de lta bu'i gang zag la bstan par bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:394: med na rang lus 'bul ba dang yod na longs
NK084(yu)005:395: spyod 'bul ba ste rdo rje slob dpon dang mched
NK084(yu)005:396: dang sems can thams cad kyi don du rang gi
NK084(yu)005:397: lus srog la yang mi lta bar longs spyod la
NK084(yu)005:398: sogs pa gtong ba de lta bu la man ngag
NK084(yu)005:400: de skad du yang snying po las /
NK084(yu)005:401: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK084(yu)005:402: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul //
NK084(yu)005:404: des ni rkyen gyis snod du rung ba bstan no //
NK084(yu)005:406: gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya //
NK084(yu)005:407: rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin //
NK084(yu)005:408: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
NK084(yu)005:409: bsregs dang sbrebs la yun ring gnas //
NK084(yu)005:411: gong du bstan pa'i snod dang ldan pa de las
NK084(yu)005:412: gzhan du mtshan nyid de dag med pa la man
NK084(yu)005:413: ngag 'di nam yang sbyin par mi bya ste snod
NK084(yu)005:414: ngan na bu la yang mi sbyin no //
NK084(yu)005:415: gong las zlog pas bshad de /
NK084(yu)005:416: thos bsam sgom la ma sbyangs dang //
NK084(yu)005:417: shes rab mig dang mi ldan zhing //
NK084(yu)005:419: gal te slob ma blo ma sbyangs pas gti mug
NK084(yu)005:420: gis shes rab rmongs pa dag la slob dpon 'phyar
NK084(yu)005:421: bas theg pa chung rgyun gyi man ngag sbyin rgyu
NK084(yu)005:422: med pas gal te'am rgya lam na sbyin par byas
NK084(yu)005:423: na de'i nyes pa ni 'chi ba'i dus min par
NK084(yu)005:424: ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ma mo dang mkha'
NK084(yu)005:425: 'gro ma rnams kyis chad pa bcad de srog zad
NK084(yu)005:426: nasa bem rig bral bar 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)005:427: shi nas yang bsregs pa tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad
NK084(yu)005:428: dang grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad dang sbrebs pa ste
NK084(yu)005:429: yi dwags phyi nang gi sgrib pa can dang sgos
NK084(yu)005:430: khur gyi sgrib pa can du skye la der yun
NK084(yu)005:431: ring po bskal pa du ma dang stong phrag mang
NK084(yu)005:432: por gansa pa'i phyir na su la yang mi sbyin
NK084(yu)005:434: gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems //
NK084(yu)005:435: mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su //
NK084(yu)005:436: sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na /
NK084(yu)005:437: dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
NK084(yu)005:439: rgya gar gyi glang po che smyon pa ni chos
NK084(yu)005:440: gsum dang ldan pa ste gnas ma yin par gnas
NK084(yu)005:441: pa rgyu sa ma yin par rgyu ba byed du
NK084(yu)005:442: ma bcug pa'i las byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:443: de yang gnas ma yin pas gnas te grong yul
NK084(yu)005:444: du sdod rgyu ba ma yin par rgyu ste lam
NK084(yu)005:445: srang dang grong bar du rgyu bya ba ma yin
NK084(yu)005:446: pa'i las byed de grong khyer bshig go //
NK084(yu)005:447: de dang rang gi sems 'dra ste gnas ma yin
NK084(yu)005:448: par gnas te bdag 'dzin la gnas 'gyu ba ma
NK084(yu)005:449: yin par 'gyu ste gzung 'dzin la 'gyu byed du
NK084(yu)005:450: ma bcug pa'i las byed de 'dod chags zhe sdang
NK084(yu)005:451: la sogs pa'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)005:452: de yang glang po che de 'dul ba'i dus su
NK084(yu)005:453: kho rgyu ba'i lam srang ngam grog por dong brkos
NK084(yu)005:454: te der rgun 'brum gyi chang blugs te bzhag pas
NK084(yu)005:455: kho rgyu ba'i dus su tshor te 'thung nas myos
NK084(yu)005:456: nas 'gro ba de la sna nas lcags kyus bzung
NK084(yu)005:457: nas snyan pa'i tshig glu gar la sogs pa byas
NK084(yu)005:458: steng du bzhon nas tho bas dal bus brdegs nas
NK084(yu)005:459: zhag bcu gcig bkug pas thul lo //
NK084(yu)005:460: de nas rang gi srid bsrung ba dang dgra'i dpung gzhom pa la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)005:461: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa gang zhig gis glang
NK084(yu)005:462: chen myos pa dang 'dra ba'i rang gi sems de
NK084(yu)005:463: rgun chang dang 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum la
NK084(yu)005:464: blo mnyam par gzhag pas btul nas su lcags kyu
NK084(yu)005:465: dang 'dra ba'i rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags
NK084(yu)005:466: la sogs pa'i sngags gsum brtan pa dang phyag rgya
NK084(yu)005:467: bzhi rab tu brtan par bya ste mngon du byas
NK084(yu)005:468: na rang gi rtog tshogs lha'i dal du shar bas
NK084(yu)005:469: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub ya mtshan chen
NK084(yu)005:471: de bas na mnyam par bzhag ces so //
NK084(yu)005:473: dur khrod chen po rab dben pa'i //
NK084(yu)005:474: ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma dang //
NK084(yu)005:475: me tog 'phreng bas brgyan pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:476: dben pa'i gnas su 'du ga nas ni //
NK084(yu)005:478: gnas la bzhi ste phyi yul gyi gnas dang sbyar
NK084(yu)005:479: te bshad pa dang nang lus kyi gnas dang sbyar
NK084(yu)005:480: te bshad pa dang gsang ba yum gyi gnas dang
NK084(yu)005:481: sbyar te bshad pa dang de kho na nyid rtsa'i
NK084(yu)005:482: gnas dang sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:483: dang po ltar na dur phung po'i gling la khroda
NK084(yu)005:484: bam gyi klong ste mi ro gsar rnying mang po
NK084(yu)005:485: gnas pa'o // chen po ni dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad lta bu'o //
NK084(yu)005:486: rab dben pa ni bsam gtan gyi 'du 'dzi las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:487: dam rdzas skye bo las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:488: 'jigs pa dgra rkun las dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:489: bar chad rkyen bgegs las dben pa'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)005:490: ri bos bskor ba ni gnas de'i mtha' ma ris
NK084(yu)005:491: bskor bas dgras mi tshugs pa dang lcug ma ljon
NK084(yu)005:492: shing gi nags tshal yod pa dang me tog gi
NK084(yu)005:493: snam bu bar ma chad pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa
NK084(yu)005:494: yi gnas dpag tshad dang rgyang grags las dben pa'i
NK084(yu)005:495: gnas te nang nam mkha' gru gsum mam shar ri
NK084(yu)005:496: mnyam pa lho ri gzhol ba nub ri mtho ba
NK084(yu)005:497: byang ri 'dud la bskor ba shing tsan+da la sogs
NK084(yu)005:498: pa dri zhim pa yod pa de lta bu'i gnas
NK084(yu)005:500: sa chog bya ma ta d+ha la bya sta gon
NK084(yu)005:501: bya dam rdzas dgram sngon 'gro gnas skabs dang sbyar
NK084(yu)005:502: ro // nang lus kyi gnas dang sbyar te bshad
NK084(yu)005:503: na rang gi lus nyid dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad
NK084(yu)005:504: de yan lag lnga mtshan ma dang drug khog pa
NK084(yu)005:505: dang bdun nang rol dang brgyad do //
NK084(yu)005:506: lus te gzhan dbang du ma song bas dben pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:507: khog pa ri bo dang 'dra ba la yan lag gis bskor bas so //
NK084(yu)005:508: skra dang spu ni lcug phran no //
NK084(yu)005:509: mig la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga ni me tog go //
NK084(yu)005:510: lus 'dzin pa dang bral bas bde ba'i gnas su
NK084(yu)005:511: gyur pa der rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad 'dus
NK084(yu)005:512: la ye shes lnga'i khro bo sgrub par bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:513: der kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa man+dala du byas /
NK084(yu)005:514: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyi thig gdab /
NK084(yu)005:515: phung po nyon mongs pa lnga'i dam rdzas bkram /
NK084(yu)005:516: ye shes lnga'i lha sgom mo //
NK084(yu)005:517: gsang ba yum gyi mkha' dang sbyar te bshad na
NK084(yu)005:518: mkha' ni dur khrod de dur ni byang sems sdud
NK084(yu)005:519: pa'o // khrod ni byang sems 'byin pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:520: dben pa ni rtsa kha kha mu kha'i sna rtse
NK084(yu)005:521: a ba d+hu ti nas sor gcig gis dpag pa'o
NK084(yu)005:522: // ri bo ni yum gyi sna rtse'o bskor ba
NK084(yu)005:523: ni rtsa ste rtsa'i mdud pa brgyad du gnas pa'o
NK084(yu)005:524: // // me tog ni yum gyi pad+ma rak+ta'o //
NK084(yu)005:525: lcug ma ni ba spu ring po'i gnas ni yum
NK084(yu)005:526: mkha' phyi khyams gru bzhi rgyas pa skye gnas zla
NK084(yu)005:527: gam dbang sna tshogs 'dud pa zlum po zhi ba
NK084(yu)005:528: sna rtse zur gsum srog gnas der gsang ba'i rdo
NK084(yu)005:529: rje 'dug nas sa blang ba lta bu'i g.ya' blang
NK084(yu)005:530: / sa chog lta bu'i rtsa btsal dkyil 'khor 'bri
NK084(yu)005:531: ba lta bu'i sbyor ba'i brdas bskul la rol bas
NK084(yu)005:532: sgrub pa bya dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la blang
NK084(yu)005:533: gsang ba'i dbang bskur 'bras bu lhan cig skyes pa'i
NK084(yu)005:535: de kho na nyid rtsa dang sbyar te bshad na
NK084(yu)005:536: dur khrod ni lus na rtsa stong phrag bdun cu
NK084(yu)005:537: rtsa bzhi'o // ri bo ni snying ngo bskor ba ni rtsa 'khor lo bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:538: lcug ma ni rtsa'o me tog ni rtsa'i nang gi thig le'o //
NK084(yu)005:539: gnas ni skyil krung bca' ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:540: nga 'dug nas ni gtum mo sbar te nam mkha'i ba bzho bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:541: de ltar bstan pa'i gnas bzhi po de'i dgos pa
NK084(yu)005:542: ni phyi bskyed rim sgom pa'i gnas dang nang rdzogs
NK084(yu)005:543: rim sgom pa'i gnas dang gsang ba gsang dbang bskur
NK084(yu)005:544: ba'i gnas dang rtsa gnas gsang dbang dang rdzogs rim
NK084(yu)005:545: la dgos pa'i gnas yin no //
NK084(yu)005:546: gnyis pa gzhung don dngos la dkyil 'khor ji ltar sgyub pa'i tshul bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:547: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med rang bzhin lhun grub
NK084(yu)005:548: kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa gnyis las dang po la
NK084(yu)005:549: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:550: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa la sogs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:551: de nyid tshogs sgrub kyi sgo nas sgrub tshul bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:552: mjug gi las bstan pa dang bzhi las /
NK084(yu)005:554: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i ting 'dzin sgom pa'i dgos pa bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:555: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:556: ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas rgyu'i he ru ka sgom pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:558: bsgoms pa'i che ba bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:560: 'dzin pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal zhing //
NK084(yu)005:561: gdug pas srid gsum 'dul ba yi //
NK084(yu)005:562: nga rgyal chen po bstan pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)005:565: sngon byung gi dus na bskal pa kun bkod bya
NK084(yu)005:566: ba la zhing khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
NK084(yu)005:567: ba byung / de la slob dpon dge slong thub
NK084(yu)005:568: dka' gzhon nu bya ba la slob ma dge slong
NK084(yu)005:569: thar pa nag po bya ba dang de'i g.yog dan
NK084(yu)005:570: phag bya bas chos nyan pas /
NK084(yu)005:571: dge slong lags na khyod theg pa chen po gsang
NK084(yu)005:572: sngags kyi chos la mkhas par grags na sngags kyi
NK084(yu)005:573: lugs kyi nyon mongs pa lnga 'jol nyog tu spyad
NK084(yu)005:574: nas sangs rgyas pa'i lam mchis sam zhes zhus pas
NK084(yu)005:576: ji bzhin nyid de ma bcos na //
NK084(yu)005:577: dngos po bzhi la gnas bcas kyang //
NK084(yu)005:578: nam mkha' la ni sprin dengs bzhin //
NK084(yu)005:579: rnal 'byor de nyid dam pa'i lam //
NK084(yu)005:580: zhes bshad pas dge slong thar pa nag pos ma
NK084(yu)005:581: rtogs te phyi gzung ba'i yul la nang 'dzin pa'i
NK084(yu)005:582: sems kyis bzung bas de gnyis kyis phyin ci log
NK084(yu)005:583: tu bltas nas gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par
NK084(yu)005:584: sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chol nas gsang
NK084(yu)005:585: sngags log par spyad pa'i dbang gisa rdo rje dmyal
NK084(yu)005:586: bar bskal pa stong phrag bcu gnyis su tsha ba
NK084(yu)005:587: dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba dang
NK084(yu)005:588: de las thar nas yi dwags bkres skom gyi sdug
NK084(yu)005:589: bsngal bskal pa stong phrag drug tu nyams su myong
NK084(yu)005:590: zhing / de las thar ba dang las kyi srin
NK084(yu)005:591: po bya'i gshog pa can dur khrod kyi bdag po
NK084(yu)005:592: chen por skyes nas ru tra'i lus ngag yid gsum
NK084(yu)005:593: gdug pa'i mthus gzugs kyi srid pa dang 'dod pa'i
NK084(yu)005:594: srid pa dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum dbang
NK084(yu)005:595: zhing / du bsdus pa'o // srid gsum 'joms pa'i
NK084(yu)005:596: ru tra de 'dul ba yi phyir de bzhin gshegs
NK084(yu)005:597: pa rnams bka' bgros nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dul
NK084(yu)005:599: dpal rta mgrin la bgo bas ma thul nas dpal chen po la 'dul bar zhus pas thul lo //
NK084(yu)005:600: sngon 'byung de bzhin du btul ba ltar da ltar
NK084(yu)005:601: gyi bsgral ba'i zhing bcu 'dul na dpal chen po'i
NK084(yu)005:602: nga rgyal sku che ba'i gzi brjid chen po bstan
NK084(yu)005:603: pa'i phyir na sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i ting 'dzin bsgom
NK084(yu)005:604: mo // de bsgoms pas gzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa
NK084(yu)005:605: zhi ste lus ngag yid gsum de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK084(yu)005:608: e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK084(yu)005:609: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK084(yu)005:610: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
NK084(yu)005:611: skyes pa nyid na skye ba med //
NK084(yu)005:613: e ma'o ni don dam pa la ngoms pa ste don dam skye med chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:614: ngo mtshar ni kun rdzob la ngoms pa ste kun rdzob ye shes dpal gyi sku byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:615: rmad kyi chosa ni dbyer med pa la ngom pa ste dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:616: de bas na ngo mtshar ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:617: de gang gi spyod yul yin na rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK084(yu)005:618: rgyas kyi spyod yul yin te rdzogs pa ni tshogs
NK084(yu)005:619: gnyis rdzogs pa'o // sangs pa ni 'khor ba'i skyon dug lnga sangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:620: rgyas pa ni che ba'i yon tan ye shes lnga rgyas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:621: kun gyi ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
NK084(yu)005:622: gsang ba ni spyod yul ma yin pa la gsang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:623: don dam par rang bzhin gyi skye ba med pa
NK084(yu)005:624: las kun rdzob tu chos thams cad skyes pa ma
NK084(yu)005:625: 'gags par sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid cir yang snang ba
NK084(yu)005:626: dang / de ltar kun rdzob tu skyes pa nyid
NK084(yu)005:627: na don dam par skye ba meda pas bden pa
NK084(yu)005:628: gnyis ka rang gi ngo bos dbyer med pa ni
NK084(yu)005:631: e ma kun tu bzang po yi //
NK084(yu)005:632: bde chen spros med thig le las //
NK084(yu)005:633: stong pa nyid du rab gsal ba'i //
NK084(yu)005:634: snying rje'i yul ni bsgom par bya //
NK084(yu)005:636: e ma ngo mtshar ba ste ma btsal ma sgrub
NK084(yu)005:637: par 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar te de ka kun
NK084(yu)005:638: tu bzang po yi dgongs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:639: bde chen ni de bzhin nyid do //
NK084(yu)005:640: spros med ni chos kyi dbyings so //
NK084(yu)005:641: thig le ni spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang ngang gis bral bar gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:642: de las stong pa nyid du rab tu gsal ba'i
NK084(yu)005:643: tshul ni gzung 'dzin gyi stong pa nyi tshe ba
NK084(yu)005:644: ma yin te chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
NK084(yu)005:645: du lhun gyis grub pa nyid rang snang nam mkha'
NK084(yu)005:646: lta bu'o // snying rje'i yul de ltar ma rtogs
NK084(yu)005:647: pa'i sems can rnams la ni snying rje bu gcig
NK084(yu)005:648: pa'i ma lta bur khyab par bsgom par bya ba
NK084(yu)005:649: ni 'gro don gyi sngon du snying rje 'gro ba
NK084(yu)005:650: ste snying rje med par gzhan don mi yong ngo
NK084(yu)005:651: lta bu'o // // snying rje sgyu ma de las
NK084(yu)005:652: rang rig pa yi ge h'u mthing nag tu byung
NK084(yu)005:653: de yang kha dog nges pa mthing ka dbyibs nges
NK084(yu)005:654: lta bu'o // // pa h+aum ngo // h'u de
NK084(yu)005:655: nges par gsal ba las thugs gnyis su med pa'i
NK084(yu)005:656: ye shes rig stong ye shes kyi rdo rje che
NK084(yu)005:657: ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje ru gsal /
NK084(yu)005:658: rdo rje de 'phro 'dus pa las sku rags pa
NK084(yu)005:659: dpal chen po he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK084(yu)005:660: pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:661: 'bar ba chen po ni bdag don du rtogs pa
NK084(yu)005:662: 'bar ba dang gzhan don du thugs rje 'bar ba'o
NK084(yu)005:663: // gar dgu yi rang bzhin ni sku sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:664: gsung rgod pa gshe ba 'jigs par sgrogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:665: thugs snying rje rngam pa zhi ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:666: de'i thugs ka ye shes sems dpa' dpal be'u rdo
NK084(yu)005:667: rje'i lte ba la h'u de las bskyed pa'i rgyu
NK084(yu)005:668: bya'o // sku de las bskal pa 'jig pa yi ni dus kyi me ltar 'bar bar grags pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:669: de lta bu'i ting 'dzin gsum po 'di la chos
NK084(yu)005:670: rnam pa dgu ste sbyang gzhi rnam pa gsum dang
NK084(yu)005:673: sbyang gzhi gsum ni shi ba don dam pa'i bden pas sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:674: skye ba bar ma do sgyu ma lta bur sbyang ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:675: skyes pa kun rdzob rags pa sbyang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:676: de bas na sbyang gzhi shi ba dang bar do dang skyes pa gsum las med do //
NK084(yu)005:677: sbyong byed gsum ni shi ba sbyong ba de ting
NK084(yu)005:678: bar do sbyor ba kun snang skyes pa sbyor ba
NK084(yu)005:679: kun ting ngo // sbyang thabs gsum ni /
NK084(yu)005:680: de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid du sgoms pas shi
NK084(yu)005:681: ba dran sems ma skyes pa de chos skur sbyangs
NK084(yu)005:683: kun tu snang snying rje sgyu ma tsam du sgoms
NK084(yu)005:684: pas bar do'i rig pa gya gyu de longs skur
NK084(yu)005:686: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin cho ga gsum las rgyu'i he ru kar sgom de 'byongs nas sprul sku 'thob /
NK084(yu)005:687: de bas na theg pa chen po sbyong thabs te
NK084(yu)005:688: chos sku nam mkha' dang 'dra ste stong longs sku
NK084(yu)005:689: nyi ma dang 'dra ste snang sprul sku cir yang
NK084(yu)005:690: ma nges par don byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:691: bzhi pa dkyil 'khor dngos sgom pa la rten gzhal yas khang sgom pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:692: brten pa lha sgom pa gnyis las /
NK084(yu)005:693: dang po la gnyis te bskyed pa'i sngags dang /
NK084(yu)005:694: de las gzhal yas khang dngos su bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:698: b+h+r+aum ni gzhal yas khang gi rgyu'o bi shwa ni
NK084(yu)005:699: sna tshogs rnam par dag pa bi shud d+he ni
NK084(yu)005:700: dag byed gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:701: de yang ji lta zhe na /
NK084(yu)005:702: gnyis pa gzhal yas khang dngos su bskyed pa la /
NK084(yu)005:703: gang du bskyed pa'i gnas kyi khyad par dang /
NK084(yu)005:704: gzhal yas khang gi rang bzhin dang /
NK084(yu)005:708: dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs pa //
NK084(yu)005:709: khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrul pa'i dkyil //
NK084(yu)005:710: keng ru'i chen po'i ri rab kyi //
NK084(yu)005:711: steng gi 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na //
NK084(yu)005:713: sems can skye ba'i rim pa dang sbyar nas bskyed pa ni nang pa'i lugs te /
NK084(yu)005:714: de la zhi ba bskyed pa ni lha gzhal yas
NK084(yu)005:715: khang nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod la rtse ba'i tshul
NK084(yu)005:716: yin la khro bo'i gnas skabs 'dir ni dper na
NK084(yu)005:717: mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lcags kyi khang
NK084(yu)005:718: sgrom 'bar ba na dmyal srungs bsad bcad kyi las
NK084(yu)005:719: byed pa dang cha bstun te bskyed pa yin pas
NK084(yu)005:720: dbang drag gi gzhal yas khang dur khrod kyi khang
NK084(yu)005:721: pa na dpal chen po yab yum 'khor dang bcas
NK084(yu)005:722: pa dmyal srung ngam srin po ltar sgom mo //
NK084(yu)005:723: spyir sems can gyi byed spyod dang sangs rgyas kyi
NK084(yu)005:724: mdzad spyod gnyis cha mthun du bya ste nyon mongs
NK084(yu)005:725: pa gnas bsgyur tha mal ba'i rtog pa bcom nas
NK084(yu)005:726: sgrib pa gcod pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:727: sems can las logs su bya rgyu med do de ni man ngag go //
NK084(yu)005:728: de la gzhal yas khang gi rgyu ni dur khrod
NK084(yu)005:729: de phyi'i dur khrod ro bzhi bskyal ba yan chad
NK084(yu)005:730: de dur khrod chen po yi gnas brgyad dang /
NK084(yu)005:731: nang gi dur khrod lus kyi gnas brgyad dang gsang
NK084(yu)005:732: ba'i dur khrod ni dpal chen po'i thugs ye shes
NK084(yu)005:733: la rnam rtog sprin dang bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:734: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rtags su rab tu 'jigs par gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:735: dur khrod de'i steng du ra dmar po las khrag gi rgya mtsho dmar nag tu 'khrugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:736: de yang rtags ni khrag chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:737: don ni ye shes gcig las ye shes mang po dang ldan pas 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa can no //
NK084(yu)005:738: de'i dkyil du kem sngo skya las kem rus chen
NK084(yu)005:739: po'i ri raba bsam mo de yang ye shes sra
NK084(yu)005:740: zhing mkhregs pas phyin ci log gi skyon dang bral
NK084(yu)005:741: ba'i rtags so // nyon mongs pa bsregs pa'i rtags
NK084(yu)005:742: su ram las ri rab kyi steng gi char me
NK084(yu)005:744: de'i me klong ngam dkyil du na dpal chen po'i bzhugs gnas sgom pa yang /
NK084(yu)005:747: ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
NK084(yu)005:748: phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i //
NK084(yu)005:749: phyi dang nang med kun tu nang //
NK084(yu)005:751: gru chad bzhi yi rnam par brgyan //
NK084(yu)005:752: gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan //
NK084(yu)005:753: 'bar ba'i bar khams gnyis kyis mdzes //
NK084(yu)005:755: spyir dkyil 'khor la gsum ste rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs pa'i yul du bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:756: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor nyams su blang ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:757: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs pa'i rten du bya ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:758: dang po ni gnyis te rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)005:759: rang bzhin 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)005:760: gnyis pa la gnyis te bskyed rim lha'i dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)005:762: gsum pa la gnyis te rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK084(yu)005:764: de la gsum ste rgyu ras bal thig gu la thags su btags pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:765: gser dngul zangs lcags la lugs su blugs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:766: rwa'am shing rdo la 'bur du brkos pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:767: de rnams las 'dir ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)005:768: de las kyang bskyed rim gtso bor ston rdzogs rim zhor la ston no //
NK084(yu)005:769: de yang rgyu ye shes rin po che las grub
NK084(yu)005:770: pa rtags 'bar ba khrag 'thung rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas
NK084(yu)005:771: su byung ba / don ye shes kyi gzhal yasa khanga ste blos gzhal ba las 'das pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:772: ye shes des thams cad du khyab pas gzhal yas
NK084(yu)005:773: khang gi tshad kyang phyogs bcur rgya yongs su ma
NK084(yu)005:774: chada pa'i phyir nam mkhas gar khyab sar gzhal yas
NK084(yu)005:775: khang gis kyang khyab par gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:776: thams cad ye shes rang snang du yin pa dang
NK084(yu)005:777: thugs ye shes la phyi dang nang med pa dang
NK084(yu)005:778: byang chub sems su gcig pas na phyi nas bltas
NK084(yu)005:779: na nang gsal ba nang nas bltas na phyi gsal
NK084(yu)005:780: ba kun tu yang nang du gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:781: 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus 'khor lo rtsibs
NK084(yu)005:782: bzhi pa mthing nag tu gnas pa ni rang bzhin
NK084(yu)005:783: rtogs pa dang ye shes 'bar bas las dang nyon
NK084(yu)005:784: mongs pa gcod pa rtags 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi don
NK084(yu)005:786: rtsibs mchan dmar po khams gsum dbang du sdud pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:787: 'phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags su
NK084(yu)005:788: gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan pa ste kha
NK084(yu)005:790: sku gsum mtshon pa'i brdar thod pa gsum gyi rtsig pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:791: rtsig pa gru chad kyis mdzes pas na brgyan ces bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:792: thugs ye shes bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su gru
NK084(yu)005:793: bzhi ni che ba'i yon tan thams cad rgyas pa'o
NK084(yu)005:794: // rnam thar mtshon pa'i sgo bzhi dang ye shes
NK084(yu)005:795: lnga ldan gyi rtsig pa sgo khyud bzhi byas pa
NK084(yu)005:796: theg pa rim pa brgyad mtshon pa'i rta babs brgyad
NK084(yu)005:797: // dang ldan pa'o // bden pa gnyis dbyer med
NK084(yu)005:798: pa'am 'khor 'das dbyer med du gnas pas 'bar ba'i
NK084(yu)005:799: khro bo'i dal bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes pa ste
NK084(yu)005:800: bar khyams dang po phra men ma'i khyams dang gnyis
NK084(yu)005:801: pa dbang phyug ma'i gnas so //
NK084(yu)005:802: bar khyams dang sgo phyogs mtshon du gnas la mdzes pa ni gnas thabs so //
NK084(yu)005:804: thod sprul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid //
NK084(yu)005:806: gzhal yas khang la thod pa rnam gsum gyis rtsig pa byas pa ni sku gsum mtshon pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:807: sbrul rigs sna tshogs sam bzhis thod pa'i mig nas
NK084(yu)005:808: brgyus pa ni zhe sdang ma spangs lhun gyis grub
NK084(yu)005:809: pa'o // nyi ma dang zla ba'i mthong khung byas pa ni log lta'i skyon bsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:810: rgyan de gsum gyi gzhal yas khang la brgyan pas brjid pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:811: thugs ye shes kyi me 'bar bas nyon mongs pa
NK084(yu)005:812: bsregs pa'i rtags su phyi nang kun nas rdo rje
NK084(yu)005:813: me dpung 'bar ba'i klong nas me'i khro bo 'phro
NK084(yu)005:814: ba de yang mang po 'phro 'du byed cing 'khrugsa
NK084(yu)005:815: pa'o // zhi ba las khyad par du byas pa na 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:817: khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /gtum pa dom gyi spar bas ni //
NK084(yu)005:818: dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung //
NK084(yu)005:820: khyu machaga ni glang po che ste gti mug gnas su dag pa'i rtags su shar bud+d+ha'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)005:821: de'i chos dbyings ye shes mtshon no //
NK084(yu)005:822: nga rgyal dag pa'i rtags su lhor rat+na la ma
NK084(yu)005:823: he yi gdan no de'i mnyam nyid ye shes mtshon
NK084(yu)005:824: no // 'dod chags dag pa'i rtags su nub tu
NK084(yu)005:825: gziga pad+ma'i gdan no des so sor rtog pa'i ye
NK084(yu)005:827: phrag dog dag pa'i rtags su byang du stag kar
NK084(yu)005:828: ma'i gdan no des bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)005:829: mtshon / zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag cing
NK084(yu)005:830: me long lta bu'i ye shes mtshon pa'i rtags su
NK084(yu)005:831: dbus badz+ra he ru ka'i gdan ni gtum thung ngam
NK084(yu)005:832: gtum pa dom gyi gdan no //
NK084(yu)005:833: sems can gyi gdan lnga po de'i spar bas ni
NK084(yu)005:834: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha chen po rnams mnan
NK084(yu)005:835: te bzung ba'o // de yang dug lnga dag ste
NK084(yu)005:836: 'phrin las mdzad pa ni sems can lnga'i 'og na
NK084(yu)005:837: dbus na dbang phyug chen po yab yum gnyis la
NK084(yu)005:838: sogs pa'i khong nas shar dri za /
NK084(yu)005:841: byang gnod sbyin pho mo byi chings su bcings nas
NK084(yu)005:842: rmig pas bardzisa sder mos bzung rang gi zhon pas
NK084(yu)005:844: dregs pa rnams 'phrin las nan dur gyis 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)005:845: gnyis pa brten pa lha sgom tshul la bdag sras dang /
NK084(yu)005:847: dang po la bdag sras kyi gtan tshigs dang /
NK084(yu)005:850: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
NK084(yu)005:851: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /khro rgyal ye shes yin pa'i phyir //
NK084(yu)005:853: rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid ni phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
NK084(yu)005:854: ci'i phyir na bdag rgyu'i he ru ka de las thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)005:855: de yang sku rdo rje 'jig pa med pa /
NK084(yu)005:856: gsung rdo rje 'gag pa med pa /
NK084(yu)005:857: thugsa kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rtog pa med pa
NK084(yu)005:858: la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir bdag po badz+ra he ru
NK084(yu)005:859: ka'o // de ni khro rgyal chen po ye nas
NK084(yu)005:860: yin te 'phral la bskyed par gyur pa lta bu
NK084(yu)005:862: de shes rab kyis rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin gyis sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:863: de med na sgom pas mi yong ste sol ba
NK084(yu)005:864: la byi dor byas pas dkar po mi yong ste
NK084(yu)005:865: de'i phyir na bdag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab
NK084(yu)005:866: yin pa'i phyir bdag gi sras sangs rgyas yin pa'o
NK084(yu)005:867: // gnyis pa bdag sras dngos la gtso bo yab
NK084(yu)005:868: yum mnyam par sbyor bas byang sems bstim pa dang
NK084(yu)005:869: // / de las khro bo'i sprin spro ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:870: bsdus te khrag 'thung rigs lngar bskyed tshul dang /
NK084(yu)005:871: khrag 'thung chen po rnams gdul bya dbang du sdud pa'i yum dang sbyor ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:872: de las sras kyi tshogs rnams bton pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:873: yum rnams rang gi gnas su bkye ba dang drug go //
NK084(yu)005:875: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas ni //
NK084(yu)005:876: khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste //
NK084(yu)005:877: hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis //
NK084(yu)005:878: rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de //
NK084(yu)005:879: gnyis med 'khril ba'i dgyes pas thim //
NK084(yu)005:881: dpal he ru ka'i thugs de bzhin nyid chos kyi
NK084(yu)005:882: dbyings kyi ngang du byung ba ste yab kyi thugs
NK084(yu)005:883: ka nasa ni yum khro mo rdo rje dbyings phyug
NK084(yu)005:884: ma lus dang grib ma ltar ram mar me gcig
NK084(yu)005:885: las gnyis su chad pa ltar mngon du phyung ste
NK084(yu)005:886: yab kyi g.yon ngos su rdzogs tshul du bskyed pa
NK084(yu)005:887: ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa g.yas rdo rje g.yon
NK084(yu)005:888: b+han+da rgyan cha lugs yab dang mthun no //
NK084(yu)005:889: de yang yab la sku gsung thugs dgyes pa'i gzi
NK084(yu)005:890: mdangs dang ldan par bzhugs te zhal nas hi hi
NK084(yu)005:891: zhes dgyes pa'i bzhad sgra dang spyan gyi gzi brjid
NK084(yu)005:892: dang zhal gyi mdangs dbyung nyid kyis yab la 'dud
NK084(yu)005:893: pa'o // yab kyi mkha' ni che ba'i yon tan
NK084(yu)005:894: 'byung bas dgos 'dod re ba yid bzhin du skong
NK084(yu)005:895: ba'i phyir rin chen nam rin po che'o //
NK084(yu)005:896: yum gyi mkha' ni chags pas ma gos pas pad+ma'o //
NK084(yu)005:897: de la yum gyi mkha' pad+ma 'dab brgyad par byin
NK084(yu)005:898: gyis brlab yab kyi mkha' rdo rje rtse lnga par
NK084(yu)005:899: byin gyis brlab / de gnyis kyis sbyor ba rgyas
NK084(yu)005:900: par mdzad de dbyings ye shes gnyis su med pa'i
NK084(yu)005:901: rtags yab yum gnyis med du 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
NK084(yu)005:902: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pas dgyes pas thams
NK084(yu)005:903: cad bde ba chen po'i ye shes su gsal ba
NK084(yu)005:904: las yab kyi byang chub sems yum gyi mkhar thim
NK084(yu)005:905: byin gyis brlab / pa'o // gnyis pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:906: byang chub sems sprin spros pa las //
NK084(yu)005:907: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung spro //
NK084(yu)005:908: h+aum h+aum h+aum bi shwa badz+ra kro ta dz+wa la man d+ha la phata phata phata /
NK084(yu)005:909: ha la ha la ha la h+aum /
NK084(yu)005:910: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu nas //
NK084(yu)005:911: mtha' yas khyab par khro bo yi //
NK084(yu)005:913: phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed thon par gyur //
NK084(yu)005:915: khro bo 'chol ba 'don pa la lnga ste /
NK084(yu)005:921: rgyu ni yab yum gyi byang sems so //
NK084(yu)005:922: rkyen ni spro bar byed pa'i sngags so //
NK084(yu)005:923: ngo bo ni khro bo 'chol ba spros pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:924: rang bzhin ni ye shes kyi sprul pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:925: dgos pa'i 'bras bu ni gdug pa can 'dul ba'i
NK084(yu)005:926: dgos pa yod la rigs lnga khrag 'thung bskyed pa'i
NK084(yu)005:927: 'bras bu yod / de bas na khro bo 'chol
NK084(yu)005:928: ba spros nas drag po las kyi khro bo gsal
NK084(yu)005:929: 'bras bu yod / lo // yab kyi lhag pa
NK084(yu)005:930: byang chub sems dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu yum
NK084(yu)005:931: gyi mkhar spros pa las yab yum dgyes pa'i lhag
NK084(yu)005:932: pa'i byang chub sems dkar dmar 'dres pa las khro
NK084(yu)005:933: bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yum gyi mkha' nas sprin
NK084(yu)005:934: phung dang 'dra bar spro ba ste de yang khro
NK084(yu)005:935: bo 'chol ba'i tshogs su spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:936: sngags don ni h+aum dang pos sku rdo rje khro
NK084(yu)005:937: bo spro h+aum gnyis pas gsung rdo rje khro bo
NK084(yu)005:938: spro h+aum gsum pas thugs rdo rje khro bo spro
NK084(yu)005:939: ba ste sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo 'chol ba
NK084(yu)005:940: spro ba'o // bi shwa sna tshogs badz+ra kro ta
NK084(yu)005:941: rdo rje khro bo dz+wa la 'bar ba man d+ha
NK084(yu)005:942: la dkyil 'khor phata sku las spros phata gsung las
NK084(yu)005:943: spros phata thugs las dang ha la sku'i dug bcom
NK084(yu)005:944: ha la gsung gi ha la thugs kyi dug bcom
NK084(yu)005:945: h+aum gnyis su med par dbang du mdzad cig pa'o
NK084(yu)005:946: spro ba'o // // 'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba
NK084(yu)005:947: rigs drug gi gnas kyis bsdus pa'i phyogs bcu nasa
NK084(yu)005:948: 'gro ba'i las dang bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir khro
NK084(yu)005:949: bo 'chol ba spro bar byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:950: phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa khyab para khro bo yi dkyil 'khor spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:951: de yang shes rab chen po'i khro bo /
NK084(yu)005:952: ye shes chen po'i khro bo /
NK084(yu)005:953: phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo gsum spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:954: khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor de da ga re
NK084(yu)005:955: re la yang che chung stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK084(yu)005:956: po'i 'jiga rten gyi khams tsam mo //
NK084(yu)005:957: de dag gi grangs mang nyung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
NK084(yu)005:958: rten gyi rdul phra mo'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs
NK084(yu)005:959: tsam thon para gyur nas bar snang la 'khrug pa
NK084(yu)005:960: lta bus gdug pa can rnams kyi lus ngag yid
NK084(yu)005:962: dbang du sdud pa dang bsgral bar byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:963: de ltar khro bo 'chol ba spro ba ni rdzu 'phrul bzhi ste kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
NK084(yu)005:965: byin gyis rlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang /
NK084(yu)005:967: dang po ni bdag badz+ra he ru kas sngags brjod pas stong gsum sngags kyi sgras khengs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:969: shes rab chen po'i khro bo dang ye shes chen
NK084(yu)005:970: po'i khro bo dang phyag rgya chen po'i khro bo
NK084(yu)005:971: gsum gyi ngo bo las khro bo grangs med pa
NK084(yu)005:974: khro bo de dag gis bgegs thams cad bcom bsad
NK084(yu)005:975: de gdug pa'i sems de dag thams cad zhi nas
NK084(yu)005:976: byang chub sems su byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:977: de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK084(yu)005:978: yang dag shes rab chen po ni //
NK084(yu)005:979: mtshan ma 'joms phyir khro bo'i mchog /rang rig ye shes rgyal po ni //
NK084(yu)005:980: phyogs bcu'i khams rnams dbang bsdus nas //
NK084(yu)005:981: kun kyang mi dmigs dbyings su thim //
NK084(yu)005:982: thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur //
NK084(yu)005:983: phyogs bcu thams cad sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)005:984: dpal chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgyar gsal //
NK084(yu)005:987: khro bo de dag gis rigs drug gi 'jig rten
NK084(yu)005:988: na ru tra la sogs pa dregs pa can rnams
NK084(yu)005:989: la sprul pa de rnams kyis gdug ba can drag
NK084(yu)005:990: pos btul nas chos snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:991: gsum pa khrag 'thung rigs lngar bskyed tshul la /
NK084(yu)005:993: rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung bskyed tshul gnyis las /
NK084(yu)005:995: de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen rigs //
NK084(yu)005:996: dbu dang phyag zhabs stong khams kyi //
NK084(yu)005:997: rdul snyed mtshon cha 'dzin pa de //
NK084(yu)005:998: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur //
NK084(yu)005:1000: dbang phyug che dang dur khrod kyi //
NK084(yu)005:1001: bdag po dregs pa khyo shugs kyi //
NK084(yu)005:1002: gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
NK084(yu)005:1004: gong du khro bo 'chol pa spros pa de nas
NK084(yu)005:1005: rigs lnga khrag 'thung gi sku bskyed pa ni lha
NK084(yu)005:1006: chen po 'og tu bardzisa pas bdud bzhi bcom pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1007: // de dag gnas su dag pas me long lta
NK084(yu)005:1008: bu'i ye shes thugs su chud rnam par shes pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1009: phung po gnas 'gyur bas khro bo'i skur snang bas
NK084(yu)005:1010: // na ldan no // yab yum kha sbyor du bzhugs pas dgyes pa chen po /
NK084(yu)005:1011: phyogs bcu khro bo 'chol ba de'i rigs yin pas bsdu ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1012: de yang khro bo 'chol ba de dag gi mtshan nyid ci zhe na dbu ma nges pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1015: grangs ma nges pa ste rdo rje rigs dang /
NK084(yu)005:1019: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs lnga yang 'chol bar spro ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1020: de yang che chung stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
NK084(yu)005:1021: khams kyi tshad tsam grangs rdul phra rab snyed du
NK084(yu)005:1022: spros pa phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin
NK084(yu)005:1023: pa de dag tshur bsdus pa'i dus na dbu gsum
NK084(yu)005:1024: phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1025: dbu gsum ni sku gsung thugs dang rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1026: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam ye shes drug go //
NK084(yu)005:1027: zhabs bzhi ni tshad med pa bzhi'am rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:1028: khro bo de dag gnas gang du bsdu zhe na
NK084(yu)005:1029: 'bar chen ni khro bo'i gnas so klong gi zhes
NK084(yu)005:1030: pa ni me dpung 'bar ba'o 'khor lo'i zhes pa
NK084(yu)005:1031: ni dbus pho brang rtsibs bzhi'i dkyil ni gtso bo
NK084(yu)005:1033: gnas de na gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1034: gdan gang la bzhugs zhe na dbus na dbang phyug
NK084(yu)005:1035: chena po yab yum dang shar dri za lhor gshin
NK084(yu)005:1036: rje nub klu'am srin po byang gnod sbyin yab yum
NK084(yu)005:1037: mo // de lnga ni dur khrod kyi bdag po dregsa pa khyo shugs kyi gdan ces bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1038: gdan 'dings tshul ni dregs pa de dag pho kha
NK084(yu)005:1039: sbub mo gan rkyal byi chings snol ma mi ro
NK084(yu)005:1041: rang rang gi bzhon pas steng nas bardzisa pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1042: gdan la bzhugs tshul gang zhe na zhabs bzhi yang g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum gyis tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1043: g.yas brkyang ba thabs kyi rang bzhin ma 'gags pa
NK084(yu)005:1044: g.yon ba skum pa shes rab kyi ngo bo bde
NK084(yu)005:1046: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung yang //
NK084(yu)005:1047: dpal chen khrag 'thung chen po dang //
NK084(yu)005:1048: rin po che dang pad+ma dang //
NK084(yu)005:1049: las su gyur nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs //
NK084(yu)005:1050: de kun 'jigs byed chen po yi //
NK084(yu)005:1051: cha lugs rngam pa'i nga ro yis //
NK084(yu)005:1052: 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum pa //
NK084(yu)005:1053: phyag drug zhabs bzhi dri za dang //
NK084(yu)005:1054: gnod sbyin gshin rje srin po la //
NK084(yu)005:1055: sogs pa khyo shugs gdan la bzhugs //
NK084(yu)005:1057: khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khora sprin phung de lta
NK084(yu)005:1058: bu dag slar yang tshur 'dus pas gdan steng na
NK084(yu)005:1059: gnas pa'o // de las rigs so sor phye nas
NK084(yu)005:1060: gdan la bzhugs pa'i tshul ni dbus rgyu'i he ru
NK084(yu)005:1061: ka la dpal chen po badz+ra he ru ka'i rigs
NK084(yu)005:1062: thim pas me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo
NK084(yu)005:1063: bo zhal gsum phyag drug tu gyur to //
NK084(yu)005:1064: shar gyi gdan stengs su stong pa nyid kyi ye
NK084(yu)005:1065: shes las gcig tu 'dus pas khrag 'thung chen po
NK084(yu)005:1066: bud+d+ha he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur
NK084(yu)005:1067: pa dang / lhor rin po che yi rigs rnams
NK084(yu)005:1068: 'dus pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
NK084(yu)005:1069: bzhin rat+na he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug pa
NK084(yu)005:1070: pa dang / dang / nub tu pad+ma'i rigs 'dus
NK084(yu)005:1071: pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes pad+ma he ru
NK084(yu)005:1072: pa dang / dang / ka dang / byang du
NK084(yu)005:1073: las kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'dus pa'am gnyis su
NK084(yu)005:1074: med par gyur nas karma he ru ka zhal gsum
NK084(yu)005:1075: phyag drug pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi
NK084(yu)005:1076: pa dang / dang / ka dang / rang bzhin
NK084(yu)005:1077: no // de rnams rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs
NK084(yu)005:1078: pa dang / dang / ka dang / rang bzhin
NK084(yu)005:1079: no // pa'o // phyogs bzhir zhes pa ni dbus
NK084(yu)005:1080: rgyu'i he ru ka dang po nas bzhugs yod pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1081: dbang du brtsis pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:1082: de kun ni khro bo de rnams so 'jigas byed ni gdug pa can rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:1083: chen po ni sku che la yan lag rags pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1084: yang na khro bo de kun kyang rgyu'i he ru
NK084(yu)005:1085: ka ltar 'bar ba'i gar dgu dang ldan pa yi
NK084(yu)005:1086: zhes pa'o // cha lugs ni dur khrod kyi chas dgus brgyan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1087: de yang thugs ye shes chen pos rtag chad kyi
NK084(yu)005:1088: mtha' sel ba ste thugs gtum zhing rngam pa'i nga
NK084(yu)005:1089: ro yis ru lu ru lu'i sgra chen po 'byin
NK084(yu)005:1090: pa'i tshul lo bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong
NK084(yu)005:1091: na rgyu nyon mongs pa dug gsum zad nas lam
NK084(yu)005:1092: khams gsum gyi zag pa bcom pas 'bras bu sku
NK084(yu)005:1093: rnam pa gsum mtshon pa'i rtags su dbu gsum pa
NK084(yu)005:1094: dang / rgyu nyon mongs pa drug zad nas lam
NK084(yu)005:1095: 'gro ba rigs drug sbyangs te pha rol tu phyin
NK084(yu)005:1096: pa drug dang ldan pas ye shes drug gi phyag
NK084(yu)005:1098: rgyu tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan lam rdzu 'phrul
NK084(yu)005:1099: gyi rkang pa bzhir dbye bas 'bras bu rnam par
NK084(yu)005:1101: zhabs des shar dri za pho mo bardzisa pa dang de ni zhe sdang spangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1102: byang du gnod sbyin phrag dog spangs pas mnan /
NK084(yu)005:1103: lhor gshin rje nga rgyal nub srin po 'dod chags spangs pa'i lha pad+ma heru ka'i gdan no //
NK084(yu)005:1104: la sogs pa ni dbus dbang phyug chen po yab
NK084(yu)005:1105: yum mo lha de dag yab yum byi chings su
NK084(yu)005:1106: byas pa ni khyo shugs so //
NK084(yu)005:1107: gdan de dag la mnan nas bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1108: khrag 'thung de rnams la gsum ste rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul dang /
NK084(yu)005:1110: 'bras bu ye shes rtogs tshul lo //
NK084(yu)005:1111: rgyu ni sems can la phung po lnga de la
NK084(yu)005:1112: gnas pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga des bskyed pa'i sha
NK084(yu)005:1113: khrag rus pa rlung lnga yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1114: lam ni rgyal ba rigs lnga gdul bya la dgongs nas khrag 'thung rigs lngar gnas 'gyur ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1115: 'bras bu ni ye shes chen po lnga rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1117: btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams //
NK084(yu)005:1118: so so'i sku la 'khril te gnas //
NK084(yu)005:1120: spyad par bya bas na btsun mo ste khrag 'athung ni khro mo'o //
NK084(yu)005:1121: chen mo ni yum lnga rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:1122: yab so so'i sku la 'khril ba ni thabs dang shes rab tu gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1123: de yang yum gnyis te rang bzhin dbyings kyi yum
NK084(yu)005:1124: khro mo lnga dang gdul bya dbang du sdud pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1125: yum dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
NK084(yu)005:1126: de la skabs 'dir ni rang bzhin dbyings kyi yum
NK084(yu)005:1127: rang gi thugs kar sbas nas dregs pa 'og tu
NK084(yu)005:1128: mnan dbang mo la sbyor ba byas te /
NK084(yu)005:1129: sras gnas yul gyi ma mo bton nas dbang mo
NK084(yu)005:1130: rang rang gi gnas su bkye nas rang gi yum
NK084(yu)005:1131: lus dang grib ma bzhin du gdod sku la 'khril
NK084(yu)005:1132: ba'o // lnga pa sras mo'i tshogs rnams phyir 'don pa la gsum ste /
NK084(yu)005:1137: de nas dgyes te ha brjod pas //
NK084(yu)005:1138: byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las //
NK084(yu)005:1139: dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)005:1140: rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma //
NK084(yu)005:1141: sbos mo dang ni gtum mo dang //
NK084(yu)005:1142: sme sha can dang ma tshogs ma //
NK084(yu)005:1143: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)005:1144: ngo mtshar chas nas rngam thon te //
NK084(yu)005:1148: dpal chen po la 'khor gyi ma mo rnam pa
NK084(yu)005:1149: gnyis te nang gi rnal 'byor ma dang phyi'i sgrub
NK084(yu)005:1150: pa mo'o // nang gi rnal 'byor ma ni dbang
NK084(yu)005:1151: po dang rnam shes gnas gyur te tshogs brgyad de
NK084(yu)005:1152: kho na nyid du dag pa'i ma mo brgyad /
NK084(yu)005:1153: spyad bya yul gyi zhen pa gnas 'gyur ba mche
NK084(yu)005:1154: gshog can gyi ma mo brgyad de bcu drug /rtag
NK084(yu)005:1155: chad mu bzhi'i mtha' bkag nas tshad med bzhir rgyas
NK084(yu)005:1156: 'debs pa sgo ma bzhi ste nyi shu po rnams
NK084(yu)005:1157: te don chos nyid rnal ma la blo rig pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1158: ye shes 'byor bas na nang gi rnal 'byor ma
NK084(yu)005:1159: zhes bya'o // spyir las las grub pa dbang phyug
NK084(yu)005:1160: nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni phyi'i sgrub pa mo zhes
NK084(yu)005:1161: zhes bya'o // bya'o // de rnams ni dpal gyi 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)005:1162: de bas na nang gi sgrub pa mo rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
NK084(yu)005:1163: yum bskyed pa de nas yab yum thabs dang shes
NK084(yu)005:1164: rab sbyor ba byas pas dgyes te ha brgyad zhal
NK084(yu)005:1165: nas brjod pas yab yum sbyor ba byas pa'i byang
NK084(yu)005:1166: chub semsa kyi tshogs sprin phung lta bu dag las
NK084(yu)005:1167: yi ge har gyur nas gnas kyi ma mo brgyad
NK084(yu)005:1169: de yang nang rnam shes kyi rnal 'byor ma bzhi
NK084(yu)005:1170: las thugs las mtshan du btags pa ke'u ri ma
NK084(yu)005:1171: ni nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pas dkar
NK084(yu)005:1172: mo'i tshagas te chos nyid la nyes pa'i skyon gyis
NK084(yu)005:1173: ma gos pas dkar yang dag pa'i don la gnas
NK084(yu)005:1174: gzhan gyis bsgyur mi nus pas rtags sngon mo'o //
NK084(yu)005:1175: las zhi ba'i las byed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1176: nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i gnas nas brkus te bla
NK084(yu)005:1177: med gnas su 'dren pas na rkun mo'i tshogas te
NK084(yu)005:1178: las rgyas pa'i las byed do //
NK084(yu)005:1180: rmongas mo'am pra mo ha ni gzhan dbang du bsdus
NK084(yu)005:1181: nas rmongs shing lkugs par byed pa ste las ni
NK084(yu)005:1182: dbang gi las byed pa dang ni /
NK084(yu)005:1183: thal byed ma'am be ta li ni bgegs dang log
NK084(yu)005:1184: 'dren thal bar rlogs shing las ni drag po'i las
NK084(yu)005:1185: byed do // sbos mo ni pus ka si ste
NK084(yu)005:1186: che ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa
NK084(yu)005:1187: rtsad nas bcad de rgyas pa'i las byed pa dang
NK084(yu)005:1188: byed do // ni / gtum mo ni karma ri
NK084(yu)005:1189: ste 'khor la gtum drag gi las byed pa dang
NK084(yu)005:1190: byed do // ni / / sma sha ni srin
NK084(yu)005:1191: po nying sha nying gis za ba sme sha can
NK084(yu)005:1192: gyi yul na gnas pa ste 'gro don spang blang
NK084(yu)005:1193: med par byed pa dang las gang yang rung ba
NK084(yu)005:1195: ma tshogas ma ni tsan+d+ha li ste ma mo de
NK084(yu)005:1196: dag la sprul pa mang po 'byung ba dang rnal
NK084(yu)005:1197: 'byor pa'i rgyud 'phel ba'i las byed pa ste de
NK084(yu)005:1198: dag ni phyi dbang po'i rnal 'byor ma bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:1199: lha mo'i tshogas de rnams kyang zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1200: pa ste zhabs ma mo'i 'gyings stabs kyis bzhugs pa
NK084(yu)005:1201: rang ranga gi lag cha'am phyag mtshan dang bcas pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1202: // de yang sku mdog phyag mtshan 'og nas legs par ston no //
NK084(yu)005:1203: khro mo de rnams kyang ngo mtshar dang bcas nas
NK084(yu)005:1204: sku gsung thugs rngams pa'i dmangs dang bcas nas te
NK084(yu)005:1205: thon te bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i klong chen
NK084(yu)005:1206: por 'khor lo'i shar lho mtshams nas 'khod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1209: nub byang du pra mo ha /
NK084(yu)005:1210: byang shar du pe ta li /
NK084(yu)005:1211: shar lho'i grub chad la puska si /
NK084(yu)005:1213: nub byang du sme sha ni /
NK084(yu)005:1214: byang shar du tsan+d+ha li rnams don chos nyid las
NK084(yu)005:1215: 'khor ba ru sems can gyi don mdzad pa la
NK084(yu)005:1216: 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang bcas pa nyid kyis byon te
NK084(yu)005:1218: gdan zhing rkyang pa re re la bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1219: de yang rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul ni rnam
NK084(yu)005:1220: par shes pa bzhi dang dbang po rnam bzhi ste
NK084(yu)005:1221: rnam shes tshogs brgyad du 'dus pas na yi ge
NK084(yu)005:1222: ha brgyad do // zhi khro gnas bsgyur na byang
NK084(yu)005:1223: chub sems dpa' brgyad po de ma mo brgyad do
NK084(yu)005:1224: ha brgyad do // // 'bras bu thob tshul ni
NK084(yu)005:1225: rigs kyi cha 'dzin pas na ye shes lnga po
NK084(yu)005:1226: ha brgyad do // // nyid thob pa'o // gnyis pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:1227: de nas dgyes te he brjod pas //
NK084(yu)005:1228: seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang ni //
NK084(yu)005:1229: stag dang wa dang khyi dang bzhad //
NK084(yu)005:1230: kang ka dur bya 'ug gdong che //
NK084(yu)005:1231: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)005:1232: ngo mtshar bcas nas rngam thon te //
NK084(yu)005:1234: phyi rol shar gyi phyogs dag nas //
NK084(yu)005:1237: de nas phra men ma brgyad bskyed pa ni dpal
NK084(yu)005:1238: chen po yab yum sbyor bas dgyes te he zhes
NK084(yu)005:1239: brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las he brgyad
NK084(yu)005:1240: phyogs mtshams su zhing gi gdan stengs su 'phros pas
NK084(yu)005:1241: bskyed pa'o // de yang phyogs mtshams kyi rnal 'byor
NK084(yu)005:1242: ma gcan gzan gyi mgo can bzhi ni lha mo
NK084(yu)005:1243: seng ha mu ka ni senga gdong chena mo'i tshogs
NK084(yu)005:1244: te dregs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
NK084(yu)005:1245: dang ye shes kyis rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa
NK084(yu)005:1246: la tshur mi tshugs pa'i don dang ni /
NK084(yu)005:1247: bya gri ma stag gi mgo can 'phrin las dpal brtul che ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1248: sri la wa yi mgo can sna sne'i thabs mkhas pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1249: shwa na khyi yi mgo can rnam rtog 'joms pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1250: mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma 'dab chags kyi mgo can bzhi ni /
NK084(yu)005:1251: kri ta bzhad gdong ma bya rgod kyi mgo can shes bya la thogs pa med pas bzhad mago'o //
NK084(yu)005:1252: kang ka dur bya yi mgo can te 'khor ba dang du len no //
NK084(yu)005:1253: kha kha mu kha bya rog gi mgo can te
NK084(yu)005:1254: 'khor 'das mnyam pa nyid du mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK084(yu)005:1255: dang ldan pa / 'ug gdong che zhes pa hu
NK084(yu)005:1256: lu ka 'ug pa'i mgo ste ye shes kyi spyan
NK084(yu)005:1257: dang ldan pas gdul bya phra mo yal bar mi
NK084(yu)005:1258: dang ldan pa / 'dor ro // ma tshogs de
NK084(yu)005:1259: rnams kyang phra men gyi mgo can zhal gcig phyag
NK084(yu)005:1260: gnyis pa rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas pa
NK084(yu)005:1261: ste seng ha kha ro la sogs te 'og tu
NK084(yu)005:1262: dang ldan pa / 'dor ro // ston no //
NK084(yu)005:1263: de rnams ngo mtshar dang bcas nasa sku gsung thugs
NK084(yu)005:1264: rngams pa'i mdangs kyis thon te 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1265: dang ldan pa / 'dor ro // ston no //
NK084(yu)005:1266: du gnas pa'o // de yang sems can gyi rang
NK084(yu)005:1267: bzhin sangs rgyas yin pa la de ltar ma rtogs
NK084(yu)005:1268: pa ngo mtshar che zhes rngam mo //
NK084(yu)005:1269: khro bo'i gzhal yas khang ni 'bar ba chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:1270: de'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol bar khyams dang po la
NK084(yu)005:1271: shar gyi phyogs daga nas rims pas 'god pa ste
NK084(yu)005:1275: byang du shwa na ste gcan gzan gyi mgo can ma bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:1277: lho nub tu kang ka /nub byang du kha kha /
NK084(yu)005:1278: byang shar du hu lu ka ste 'dab chags kyi mgo can ma bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:1279: de ltar bar khyams dang po'i phyogs mtshams rnams su
NK084(yu)005:1280: gdan zhing rkyang re re'i steng du 'khor bar gdul
NK084(yu)005:1281: bya'i zhing du gzigs nas sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1283: de yang rgyu sems can gyi ldan tshul ni dbang
NK084(yu)005:1284: po dang rnam shes kyi khyad par spyad bya yul
NK084(yu)005:1286: zhi khro gnas bsgyur ba ni phyi nang gi sems ma rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:1287: de bas na yul gyi ma mo brgyad ces bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1288: 'bras bu ye shes kyi thob tshul ni yul dag
NK084(yu)005:1289: pa chos kyi dbyings yin la de la ye shes
NK084(yu)005:1290: lnga'i rol pa ma 'gags par gnas pa thob pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1292: de nas dgyes te phata brjod pas //
NK084(yu)005:1293: rdo rje sring 'gro ma tshogs dang //
NK084(yu)005:1294: gdong mo 'jig rten ro langs ma //
NK084(yu)005:1295: tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)005:1296: ngo mtshar chas nas 'jigs thon te //
NK084(yu)005:1297: dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir rngam gzugs gnas //
NK084(yu)005:1299: phra men ma brgyad bskyed pa'i rjes de nas sgo
NK084(yu)005:1300: ma bzhi bskyed pa ni dpal chen po dgyes te
NK084(yu)005:1301: phata brjod pasa thabs shes gnyis su med pa'i byang
NK084(yu)005:1302: chub sems las phata bzhi sgo bzhir 'phros pa las
NK084(yu)005:1303: bskyed pa ste shar du rdo rje sringsa 'gro ma'am
NK084(yu)005:1304: lcags kyu ma'i tshogs ni rta'i mgo can te rta
NK084(yu)005:1305: mgyogs shing shugs drag pa dang 'dra bar thugs rje
NK084(yu)005:1306: mgyogs shing shugs drag pas 'khor ba ma stong gi
NK084(yu)005:1308: 'khor bar mi gtong 'dzin ches kyang bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1309: lhor gdong mo'am zhags pa ma ni phag gi mgo
NK084(yu)005:1310: can te phag dang 'dra bar nyon mongs pa'i tha
NK084(yu)005:1311: ba klog 'phrin las gdong tshugs su byed do //
NK084(yu)005:1312: nub tu 'jig rten ma'am lcags sgrog ma ni dred
NK084(yu)005:1313: kyi mgo can te nyi ma dang 'dra bar dgra
NK084(yu)005:1314: bgegs thams cad bsreg pas na nyi zla dmar mo
NK084(yu)005:1315: 'jig rten ma'o // byang du ro langas ma'am dril
NK084(yu)005:1316: bu ma ni spyang khu'i mgo can te khams gsum
NK084(yu)005:1317: gyi sems can ro dang 'dra ba de rnams la
NK084(yu)005:1318: ye shes kyi dran pa bskyed par byed de spyang
NK084(yu)005:1320: 'di bzhi'i gsang mtshan la mi pham ma /
NK084(yu)005:1323: ro langs ma bzhi zhes gsungs so //
NK084(yu)005:1324: de dag kyang rang rang gi sprul pa'i tshogs rnams
NK084(yu)005:1325: dang bcas nas rang rang gi lag cha lcags kyu
NK084(yu)005:1326: la sogs pa bsnams pa dang bcas sems can thams
NK084(yu)005:1327: cad kyi lus kyi dbang po sgo ma bzhi yin
NK084(yu)005:1328: pa la yin par ma rtogs pa la ngo mtshar
NK084(yu)005:1329: dang bcas te chas nas 'jig rten sems can ma
NK084(yu)005:1330: rung ba rnams gdul byar gzigs nas 'jigs pa'i gzugs
NK084(yu)005:1331: kyis thona te dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhira ram sgo
NK084(yu)005:1332: bzhi'i nang na zhing pags re re'i steng du sku
NK084(yu)005:1333: gsung thugs rngama pa'i gzugs dang bcas nas gnas shing
NK084(yu)005:1334: bzhugs pa'o // de yan chad ni nang gi rnal 'byor ma rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:1336: dgyes pa'i srin dag phyogs bcu nas //
NK084(yu)005:1337: phata ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros //
NK084(yu)005:1339: de ltar pho rnams 'og tu mnan nas dbang mo
NK084(yu)005:1340: nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sbyor ba byas shing sras
NK084(yu)005:1341: bton nas yab yum dgyes par rol pa'i byang chub
NK084(yu)005:1342: sems kyi sprin dag las phyogs bcu nas phata ces
NK084(yu)005:1343: pa'i sgra bsgrags pa'am byung bas dbang phyug ma thams
NK084(yu)005:1344: cad khros te gnag rgod la rdzas btab pa ltar
NK084(yu)005:1345: khros nas rang rang gi gnas gang yin pa der
NK084(yu)005:1346: song ngo // dpal chen po rigs lnga yab rnams
NK084(yu)005:1347: la rang rang gi yum lus dang grib ma lta
NK084(yu)005:1348: bur sku la 'khril nas bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1349: gnyis pa gzhan sras la gnyis te 'ju 'dul bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1351: dang po la bskul bar dam bca' ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1354: lha kun 'od du zhu ba dang bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:1356: de nas dpa' chen po khro bo'i rigs //
NK084(yu)005:1357: lhun gyis grub par bya ba'i phyir //
NK084(yu)005:1358: rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas //
NK084(yu)005:1359: bskul tshig 'di yang rab tu brjod //
NK084(yu)005:1361: bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir bdag gi
NK084(yu)005:1362: sras su de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba'i rjes de
NK084(yu)005:1363: nas rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis grub par bya
NK084(yu)005:1364: ba'i phyir bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs pa
NK084(yu)005:1365: bya ba ni dpal chen po badz+ra he ru ka'i
NK084(yu)005:1366: rang bzhin khro bo'i rigs yin te /
NK084(yu)005:1367: de ye nas rang gi phung po dang 'byung ba
NK084(yu)005:1368: dang khams skye mched kyi rang bzhin lha'i dal du
NK084(yu)005:1369: lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas pa yin kyang rtogs
NK084(yu)005:1370: par ma gyur pa de ma rtogs pa rtogs par
NK084(yu)005:1371: bya ba'i phyir dang ma grub pa grub par bya
NK084(yu)005:1372: ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya'o
NK084(yu)005:1373: // badz+ra he ru ka'i thugs ka nas rang gi
NK084(yu)005:1374: ngang tshul de bzung ba'am rang sems can gyi lus
NK084(yu)005:1375: 'di kho na 'dra ba gcig byung nas dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1376: gyi bar khyams nas lha la bskor ba lan gsum
NK084(yu)005:1377: byas nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste rnal 'byor
NK084(yu)005:1378: chen po'i rkyang phyag lan gsum du btsal nas thal
NK084(yu)005:1379: mo sbyar long bu gshibs rkang pa sa la sbyar
NK084(yu)005:1380: nas gsol ba 'debs pa'i ngag gam bskul tshig 'di
NK084(yu)005:1382: 'dir rang gi ngang tshul slob dpon la la ni
NK084(yu)005:1383: rang tha ma la gyi lus bzung bar bya ste
NK084(yu)005:1384: lhar byas na rtog pa sbyar rgyu rang ci yod
NK084(yu)005:1385: gsungs la / sgyu 'phrul yongs grags pa la la
NK084(yu)005:1386: na re rang lha'i bu'am tshangs pa'i phru gu ltar
NK084(yu)005:1387: bya ste lha bsod nams che bas grub thag nye
NK084(yu)005:1388: ba'i dgos pa yod gsungs so //
NK084(yu)005:1389: sgyu 'phrul bka' lugs pa ni rang gi ngang tshul
NK084(yu)005:1390: zer bas na rang rdo rje srin phrug zhes bya
NK084(yu)005:1391: ba khro chung srin po phru gu ltar bya ste
NK084(yu)005:1392: lus tha mal gyi lus yin yang cha byad srin
NK084(yu)005:1393: po lta bu zhig yi dam lha'i thugs ka nas
NK084(yu)005:1394: thon nas gzhal yas khang la bskor ba lan gsum
NK084(yu)005:1395: byas nas nub sgor 'dug ste zhal shar du gzigs
NK084(yu)005:1396: nas rkyang phyag lan gsum bya ste bdag sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)005:1397: yin pa la yin par ma shes pas da yi
NK084(yu)005:1398: dam lha dang bdag gis dbu bzung ba'i sems can
NK084(yu)005:1399: thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro zhes gsol ba 'debs
NK084(yu)005:1400: pa'o // de yang gdul bya drag po la dgongs pa'i gnad kas khro chung du 'dod do //
NK084(yu)005:1401: de gsum gang byas kyang 'dra ste tshangs pa ni
NK084(yu)005:1402: zhi ba yin pas na phyi la bka' lugs ltar
NK084(yu)005:1404: sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni //
NK084(yu)005:1405: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)005:1406: rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na //
NK084(yu)005:1407: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /ces pas bstan te /
NK084(yu)005:1408: de la yi ge gyis mgo drangs nas dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1409: gyi lha khyed kyis sngon gyi thugs dam chen po
NK084(yu)005:1410: zhal gyis bzhes pa ni byang chub mchog tu sems
NK084(yu)005:1411: bskyed nas dam bcas pa ste ji ltar bcas na
NK084(yu)005:1412: phyi snod dang nang bcud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
NK084(yu)005:1413: ma lus pa thams cad kun dag pa ye shes
NK084(yu)005:1414: kyi snang bar byas te ma dag 'khrul pa'i snang
NK084(yu)005:1415: ba spong bar byed pa'i phyir 'khor ba las rgyal
NK084(yu)005:1416: bas rgyal ba'i zhing du sgrol ba'am sbyor bar zhal
NK084(yu)005:1417: gyis bzhes pas na da khyed kyi khongs su rnal
NK084(yu)005:1418: 'byor pa bdag kyang rtogs par byed /
NK084(yu)005:1419: khyed kyi sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya chen pora
NK084(yu)005:1420: rnal 'byor pa bdag kyang dbyer med par sbyor cig
NK084(yu)005:1422: de yang tshig rkang dang pos dus ci tsam na
NK084(yu)005:1423: bsgral bar dam bcas pa dang gnyis pas gang bsgral
NK084(yu)005:1424: bar dam bca' ba dang gsum pas gang du bsgral
NK084(yu)005:1425: bar dam bca' ba dang bzhi pas de ji ltar
NK084(yu)005:1428: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i //
NK084(yu)005:1429: ye shes zer gyis lus rtog sbyangs //
NK084(yu)005:1430: gser zhun lta bu'i sems dag las //
