NK084(yu)005:1432: thugs kar thim nas sku yi dbyig /rdo rje'i lam
NK084(yu)005:1433: byung yum gyi mkha' //chos sku byang chub sems su
NK084(yu)005:1435: de ltar gsol ba btab pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha
NK084(yu)005:1436: mas thabas dang shes rab gnyis su meda pa'i sbyor
NK084(yu)005:1437: ba mdzad pas byang chub sems kyi rgyu yab las
NK084(yu)005:1438: byung ste yum la thim yum gyi mkha' nas ye
NK084(yu)005:1439: shes 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phros pas bdag gi
NK084(yu)005:1440: lus ngag yid gsum gyi rtog pa thams cad bya
NK084(yu)005:1441: sgro me la bsregs pa bzhin tshig nas sdig sgrib
NK084(yu)005:1442: dang bag chags ngan pa thams cad gtan nas sbyangs
NK084(yu)005:1443: te rig pa byang chub kyi sems de dper na
NK084(yu)005:1444: gser zhun ma zhig skong bu na gnas pa lta
NK084(yu)005:1445: bu'i tshul du ltem ltem zhu nas gnas pa'i kun
NK084(yu)005:1446: gzhi byang chub sems kyi gzugs brnyan de dag la
NK084(yu)005:1447: / yang lha rnams kyi gnas gsum nas sku gsung
NK084(yu)005:1448: thugs gsum gyi byin brlabs 'od kyi yi ge 'bru
NK084(yu)005:1449: gsum 'phros nas 'od de thim 'od de rnams la
NK084(yu)005:1450: rang bzhin med pa'i yi ge +aahh+aum gsum du gyur
NK084(yu)005:1451: te yi ge de gsum yang h'u du gyur /
NK084(yu)005:1452: h'u 'od kyi yig 'bru sgyu ma tsam de'o //
NK084(yu)005:1453: yi ge h'u de yang bar khyams nas bskor ba
NK084(yu)005:1454: lan gsum byas nas bung ba me tog la lding
NK084(yu)005:1455: ba lta bu ste gtso bo'i thugs kar thim nas
NK084(yu)005:1456: / de sku'i dbyig tu gyur pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:1457: sku yi dbyig nas sgal tshigs kyi rta brgyud rdo
NK084(yu)005:1458: rje'i lam du byung yum gyi mkha'a la babs nas
NK084(yu)005:1459: sprin med nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar dril nas gnas
NK084(yu)005:1460: so // h+aum de'i 'od zer gyis yab yum yang
NK084(yu)005:1461: 'od du zhu nas chos kyi sku yi ngo bo
NK084(yu)005:1462: rig pa byang chub sems su gnas pa sprin med
NK084(yu)005:1465: lha rnams so so'i snying po'i sgra //
NK084(yu)005:1466: h+aum ha he phata ces byung nas ni //
NK084(yu)005:1467: byang chub sems su gcig par thim //
NK084(yu)005:1469: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyang so so'i snying pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1470: sgra h+aum ha he phata cesa pa byung nas 'od
NK084(yu)005:1471: du zhu ba'o // rigs lnga'i sngags h+aum gnas kyi
NK084(yu)005:1472: ma brgyad ha yul gyi ma brgyad he sgo ma
NK084(yu)005:1473: bzhi phata ces byung nas ni 'od du zhu ba'o
NK084(yu)005:1474: du zhu ba'o // // rigs lnga'i h+aum gi sgra sgrogs shing 'od du thim mo //
NK084(yu)005:1476: 'od de rnams kyang dbus kyi 'od byang chub sems
NK084(yu)005:1477: su gcig par thim ste dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na
NK084(yu)005:1478: 'od kyi gong bu gcig tu gnas te de ni
NK084(yu)005:1480: gnyis pa dkyil 'khor bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)005:1483: dang po la lnga ste yab yum bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1484: dbang dang gnas gsum byin rlabs bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1485: rjes chags kyi glu yis nga rgyal bzung zhing mkha'
NK084(yu)005:1486: gsang byin gyis brlabs te snyoms 'jug gi glus bskul
NK084(yu)005:1487: ba dang / rjes chags la bsnyen sgrub rnam bzhi tshang bar bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1488: byang chub sems sprin yum mkha' nas spros te mnyes mchod phul nas bstim pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1490: de nas snying po dran tsam gyis //
NK084(yu)005:1491: gsung gi phyag rgya gnyis rdzogs nas //
NK084(yu)005:1493: thugs kyi phyag rgya rab tu 'bar //
NK084(yu)005:1495: phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs //
NK084(yu)005:1497: de nas snying po yi ge h+aum yid la brengs
NK084(yu)005:1498: kyis dran pa tsam gyis yi ge h+aum log pa
NK084(yu)005:1499: dang ma log pa gnyis su gyur to //
NK084(yu)005:1500: de ltar gsung gi phyag rgya h+aum sgril ma gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1501: su gsal ba ni gsung yig 'bru'i cho ga ste
NK084(yu)005:1502: h+aum brtan par gsal ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1503: // de nas h+aum de las 'od zer phar 'phro
NK084(yu)005:1504: bas bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs rgyud bskul 'gro ba
NK084(yu)005:1505: sems can gyi bag chags dang rtog sgrib sbyangs nas
NK084(yu)005:1506: tshur 'dus pas h+aum la thim pa'i sbyor ba yis
NK084(yu)005:1507: thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu'am b+han+d+ha gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1508: su gyur pa ni thugs phyag mtshan gyi cho ga'o
NK084(yu)005:1510: shing 'dus pa las he ru ka'i sku phra mo
NK084(yu)005:1511: zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bsgrad pa yum dang
NK084(yu)005:1512: 'khril nas bzhugs pa zhig tu gyur pa ni sku
NK084(yu)005:1514: de nas phra mo'i sku de las 'od zer 'phro 'dus pa las /
NK084(yu)005:1515: lha sku phyag rgya chen po'i sku gnyis rdzogs par
NK084(yu)005:1516: sgom pa ni dpal chen po zhal g.yas dkar ba
NK084(yu)005:1517: g.yon dmar ba dbus ma mthing ka rdo rje 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1518: yug thong gshol g.yas b+han+d+ha pad+ma ral gri g.yon na
NK084(yu)005:1519: 'dzin pa yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog
NK084(yu)005:1520: mthing ka g.yas yab la 'khyud pa g.yon thod pa
NK084(yu)005:1523: ma h+aa shu nya ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1524: ma h+aa a dar+sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1525: ma h+aa pra t+ya be sha dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1526: ma h+aa sa man ta dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1527: ma h+aa kri t+ya nu sh+tha na dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1528: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ka ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1529: sarba ta th+aa ga ta wak+ka badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1530: sarba ta th+aa ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&a ham /
NK084(yu)005:1531: zhes pa ste bdag yab yum gyi mkha' las lha
NK084(yu)005:1532: mo bzhi 'phros pas 'og min nas rigs lnga khrag
NK084(yu)005:1533: 'thung spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon
NK084(yu)005:1534: par bsam mo // yab yum thabs shes rab gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1535: su med pa'i chu rgyun gyis dbang bskur te dbang
NK084(yu)005:1536: rtags su rigs lnga khro bos dbu brgyan par bsam
NK084(yu)005:1537: par bsam mo // mo // de ltar bdag nyid
NK084(yu)005:1538: dal rdzogs pa la dbang bskur ba dang gnyis su
NK084(yu)005:1539: med pa'i byang chub sems kyis sbyangs nas sems can
NK084(yu)005:1540: ma yin sangs rgyas yin te 'o na sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)005:1541: la sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi ye
NK084(yu)005:1542: shes dang ldan na bdag la ldan nam zhe na
NK084(yu)005:1543: ldan par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:1544: sngags don ni ye shes lnga ma h+aa chen po
NK084(yu)005:1545: shu nya ta stong pa nyid dz+ny+aa na ye shes
NK084(yu)005:1546: badz+ra rdo rje swa b+ha wa ngo bo nyid at+ma
NK084(yu)005:1549: spyi bo na thod pa'i gzhal yas khang na bcom
NK084(yu)005:1550: ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1551: sku mdog smug nag g.yas 'khor yug g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams
NK084(yu)005:1552: pa yum smug nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa
NK084(yu)005:1554: de bzhin du thog mtha' snga ma ltar la a
NK084(yu)005:1555: dar+sha me long lta bu ste bdag gi dpral ba
NK084(yu)005:1556: na thod pa'i khang bu'i nang du bcom ldan 'das
NK084(yu)005:1557: badz+ra he ru ka mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis
NK084(yu)005:1558: pa g.yas na rdo rje g.yon na b+han+d+ha bsnams pa
NK084(yu)005:1559: yum mthing nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon b+han+d+ha stob par
NK084(yu)005:1560: bsam la sngags kyis nga rgyal bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1561: pra t+ya be sha mnyam pa nyid do rna ltag
NK084(yu)005:1562: g.yas su thod pa'i khang bu'i nang du bcom ldan
NK084(yu)005:1563: 'das rat+na he ru ka ser nag g.yas thong gshol
NK084(yu)005:1564: g.yon b+han+d+ha yum thod pa stobs par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)005:1565: sa man+ta so sor rtog pa ste ltag khung du
NK084(yu)005:1566: thod pa'i khang bu'i nang na bcom ldan 'das pad+ma
NK084(yu)005:1567: he ru dmar nag g.yas dgra sta g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams
NK084(yu)005:1568: pa yum g.yas rdo rje g.yon b+han+d+ha gtso la stob
NK084(yu)005:1569: pa bsam la sngags kyis nga rgyal bya so sor
NK084(yu)005:1570: rtog pa'i ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1571: kri t+ya nus tha na bya ba grub pa ste
NK084(yu)005:1572: rna ltag g.yon du thod pa'i khang bu'i nang du
NK084(yu)005:1573: bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang
NK084(yu)005:1574: nag g.yas ral gri g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams pa yum rdo
NK084(yu)005:1575: rje dang thod pa gtso la stob par sngags kyis
NK084(yu)005:1576: nga rgyal bya bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su
NK084(yu)005:1577: dbang bskur ro // de rnams yi ge h+aum lnga las bskyed do //
NK084(yu)005:1578: de yan chad kyis ye shes lngas dbang bskur bstan //
NK084(yu)005:1579: sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:1580: sngags kyi mgo 'dren pa sarba thams cad ta th+aa
NK084(yu)005:1581: ga ta de bzhin gshegs pa ka ya sku badz+ra
NK084(yu)005:1582: rdo rje swa b+ha wa ngo bo nyid at+ma ko
NK084(yu)005:1584: de yang spyi bo klad pa dung khang nang du
NK084(yu)005:1585: las bud+d+ha he ru ka g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus
NK084(yu)005:1586: smug zhal / 'khor yug rdo rje dung chen g.yas
NK084(yu)005:1587: ral gri dgra sta thong gshol g.yon na bsnams pa
NK084(yu)005:1588: bskyed sngags kyis nga rgyal bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1589: de bzhin du sarba thams cad ta th+aa ga ta
NK084(yu)005:1590: de bzhin gshegs pa wa k+ka badz+ra gsung rdo rje
NK084(yu)005:1591: swa b+ha wa ngo bo nyid at+ma ko ham bdag
NK084(yu)005:1592: nyid nga'o // mgrin par pad+ma'i steng du am las
NK084(yu)005:1593: bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka g.yas sngo g.yon
NK084(yu)005:1594: dkar dbus dmar zhal ral gri rdo rje 'khor yug
NK084(yu)005:1595: g.yas dung dmar dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon na bsnams
NK084(yu)005:1596: nyid nga'o // pa'o // sarba ta th+aa ga ta
NK084(yu)005:1597: sngar ltar la tsit+ta badz+ra thugs rdo rje swa b+ha
NK084(yu)005:1598: wa at+ma ko ham yang sngar ltar ro //
NK084(yu)005:1599: thugs kar nyi ma'i steng du h+aum las bcom ldan
NK084(yu)005:1600: 'das badz+ra he ru ka g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus
NK084(yu)005:1601: mthing zhal rdo rje 'khor yug dung chen g.yas ral
NK084(yu)005:1602: gri dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon yum mthun sngags kyis
NK084(yu)005:1603: nga rgyal bya ba ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1605: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa a nu ra
NK084(yu)005:1606: ga dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko ham
NK084(yu)005:1607: / sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa pu tsa badz+ra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko ham /
NK084(yu)005:1608: rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs pa //
NK084(yu)005:1609: h+aum las rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
NK084(yu)005:1610: bam las pad+mara gyur pa'i dbus //
NK084(yu)005:1611: ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sgom //
NK084(yu)005:1612: sha ta pa la sogs pa'i glus //
NK084(yu)005:1613: bskul bdag kyang rab tu bya //
NK084(yu)005:1615: 'dir sngags mtshan gnyis kyi don skyo ston shag ye
NK084(yu)005:1616: shes ni snga mas lte bar rin po che'i steng
NK084(yu)005:1617: na rat+na he ru ka g.yas dmar g.yon dkar dbus
NK084(yu)005:1618: ser zhal dung chen rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas ral
NK084(yu)005:1619: gri dgra s+t+wa thong gshol g.yon na 'dzin pa sgom
NK084(yu)005:1620: phyi mas gsang bar rdo rje rgya gram steng na
NK084(yu)005:1621: ha las karma he ru ka g.yas dmar g.yon dkar
NK084(yu)005:1622: dbus ljang zhal dgra s+t+wa rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas
NK084(yu)005:1623: dung chen ral gri thong gshol g.yon na bsnams pa
NK084(yu)005:1624: sgom par gsungs pa yin skad do //
NK084(yu)005:1625: de ltar bsams kyang 'gal ba med do //
NK084(yu)005:1626: dngos ni byang chub sems kyi sngags yin no //
NK084(yu)005:1627: mkha' gsang rdo rje dang pad+mara byin gyis brlab pa
NK084(yu)005:1628: ni yab kyi mkha' ni h+aum badz+ra zhes pas thugs
NK084(yu)005:1629: ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su h+aum las
NK084(yu)005:1630: rdo rje mthing ka rtse lnga para sgom mo //
NK084(yu)005:1631: yum gyi mkha' pam las pad ma 'dab ma brgyad
NK084(yu)005:1632: par gyur pa'i dbus su bde bar bshegs pa thams
NK084(yu)005:1633: cad bskyed pa'i rtags su ma las nyi ma'i dkyil
NK084(yu)005:1634: 'khor gyi steng du ma dmar mo gcig bsgom mo
NK084(yu)005:1635: // de nas brdas bskul ba ni yum gyis sa ma ya h+aum zhes bskul /
NK084(yu)005:1636: yab kyis sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes bskul /
NK084(yu)005:1637: yum gyis a nu ra ga ya mi zhes brjod /
NK084(yu)005:1638: yab kyis a nu ra ga ya ham zhes brjod
NK084(yu)005:1639: nas yab yum brda' bsnol mas bskul te sha ta
NK084(yu)005:1640: pa la sogas pa'i glu drug gis dgyes pa bskyed
NK084(yu)005:1641: pas byang chub sems phab la sngags gnyis pos mchod
NK084(yu)005:1642: pa bya'o // rjes su chags pa'i sngags kyis nang du sems bzung /
NK084(yu)005:1643: mchod pa pu tsa'i sngags kyi phyogasabacu'a bde bar gshegs pa mchod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1644: glu drug ni sha ta pa dang gar ta pa
NK084(yu)005:1645: gnyis rtsa ba'i rigs pa gnyis dang breng nge ba
NK084(yu)005:1646: dang dung nge ba gnyis 'bring po gnyis dang sang
NK084(yu)005:1647: ka de'u dang cang ka de'u yi glu gnyis thung
NK084(yu)005:1649: de re re la yon tan bcu bcu dang ldan te 'du shes bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1655: gang gis mi tshugs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1659: bcu po de re re la yang glu drug drug pos khyab pa ste drug cu tshan drug go //
NK084(yu)005:1660: de la gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu zhes bya ste /
NK084(yu)005:1661: delta bu'i glus yab yum rang rang chags pa byed
NK084(yu)005:1662: pa'i bde ba bskyed par bskul ba dag kyang rab
NK084(yu)005:1664: bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang /
NK084(yu)005:1665: bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po //
NK084(yu)005:1666: zhes pa ste spyir bsnyen bsgrub la gsum ste phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1667: phyi ni lam la bsnyen sgrub bzhi ste lta ba tshol ba nas kun snang yan chad bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)005:1668: phyag rgya gcig pa yan chad nas spros pa yan chad nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)005:1669: bar chad med pa nas phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yan chad sgrub pa /
NK084(yu)005:1670: lhun gyis grub pa nas sangs rgyas la sbyor ba sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:1671: nang gi bzhi ni dang po yo byad bsags pa nas nub dang po yan chad bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)005:1672: de nas ci tsam byed pa'i byed tshun chad nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)005:1674: nub tha ma'i dus su dngos grub len pa sgrub
NK084(yu)005:1675: pa chen po de ni sgrub pa dus kyi bsnyen
NK084(yu)005:1676: sgrub bo // gsang ba la gnyis te sgrol ba dang sbyor ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1677: sgrol ba bzhi ni dang po gzhi tshol ba nas dbang bskur ba bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)005:1678: bsgral ba bzhi dang ldan pa nye bsnyen /
NK084(yu)005:1679: khog pa dral ba sgrub pa /
NK084(yu)005:1680: nyon mongs pa rgyun bcad de bsgral ba ni sgrub chen no //
NK084(yu)005:1681: sbyor ba ni yum tshol ba nas chas su zhugs pa bsnyen pa /
NK084(yu)005:1682: g.yem la bskyed pa nye bsnyen rol ba sgrub pa /
NK084(yu)005:1683: thig le gcig shor gnyis gnas kyi dus sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:1684: de las 'di sbyor ba'i khongs su 'gro /
NK084(yu)005:1685: de la gnyis te lha bskyed pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1686: dbang bskur ba las 'dir lha bskyed pa'i bsnyen bsgrub
NK084(yu)005:1687: bzhi ni yum bskyed cing mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab
NK084(yu)005:1689: brda bsnol mar bskul ba nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1690: phyag rgya bzhis rol ba ste thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba ni sgrub pa dang ni /
NK084(yu)005:1691: bde ba nyams su myong ste lhag pa byang chub sems babs pa ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:1694: bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro //
NK084(yu)005:1695: sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la //
NK084(yu)005:1696: dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim //
NK084(yu)005:1698: yum gyi mkha' pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1699: du lhag pa byang chub kyi sems gsal ba dang
NK084(yu)005:1700: rtog pa med par byas te /
NK084(yu)005:1701: de lta bu'i byang chub sems bde ba thugsa ye
NK084(yu)005:1702: shes kyi bdag nyid kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil
NK084(yu)005:1703: 'khor ma lus pa thams cad la yang spro'o //
NK084(yu)005:1704: de yang ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams gang bar
NK084(yu)005:1705: dus gsum sangs rgyas mang po sprin tshogs 'thib pa
NK084(yu)005:1706: ltar ma lus pa stong gsum yungs 'brur gzhug tshul
NK084(yu)005:1707: du spyan drangs la bdag nyid yab yum gyi sku
NK084(yu)005:1708: la bstim / gong gi sngags gnyis po 'chad de /
NK084(yu)005:1709: lhag pa byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i mchod pas
NK084(yu)005:1710: dgyes par byed de de yang yab yum mnyam par
NK084(yu)005:1711: sbyor ba las byung zhing mchod pa kun gyi nang
NK084(yu)005:1712: nas zag med bde ba chen po mchog gi mchod
NK084(yu)005:1713: pa yin la de lta bu'i sbyin pa'am mchod pasa
NK084(yu)005:1714: sems can rnams kyang dga' bar don byas nas yum
NK084(yu)005:1715: gyi mkha' gzhal yas khang gi nang du bstim mo
NK084(yu)005:1716: // gnyis pa 'khor bskyed pa la gnyis te /
NK084(yu)005:1718: sngags kyis phyir bton te lha so sor sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1720: de nas dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod //
NK084(yu)005:1722: de ltar byang chub sems yum gyi mkhar bstim pa de yig 'brur gyur /
NK084(yu)005:1723: de las phyag mtshan du gyur de las sku phra
NK084(yu)005:1724: mor gyur de nasa sngags kyis phyir gzhal yas khang
NK084(yu)005:1725: du bton te dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1727: sarba ta th+aa ga ta sogs kyi bstan /
NK084(yu)005:1728: ye shes lnga sarba thams cad ta th+aa ga ta
NK084(yu)005:1729: de bzhin gshegs pa ma h+aa chen po sh+ri dpal
NK084(yu)005:1730: he ru ka dgyes pa ma h+aa chen po tsan+da
NK084(yu)005:1731: gtum pa sarba thams cad dush+tan sdang ba ta ka
NK084(yu)005:1732: rtogs ha na rgyab bo da ha chod pa pa
NK084(yu)005:1733: tsa chom h+aum h+aum h+aum sku gsung thugs bsdus la
NK084(yu)005:1735: de yang bud+d+ha he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug
NK084(yu)005:1736: ste g.yas ljang g.yon ser dbus smug zhal 'khor yug
NK084(yu)005:1737: rdo rje thong gshol g.yas dung dmar dgra s+t+wa ral
NK084(yu)005:1738: gri g.yon na bsnams pa sngags 'dis shar gyi gdan
NK084(yu)005:1740: badz+ra ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+da
NK084(yu)005:1741: sarba du sh+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa
NK084(yu)005:1743: ces pa gzhan gong dang 'dra la badz+ra rdo rje
NK084(yu)005:1744: ste dbus su badz+ra he ru ka g.yas smug g.yon
NK084(yu)005:1745: dmar dbus sngo zhal rdo rje 'khor yug thong gshol
NK084(yu)005:1746: g.yas dung dmar dgra s+t+wa ral gri g.yon yum sngo
NK084(yu)005:1747: nag g.yas rdo rje g.yon b+ha n+d+ha gtso la stobs
NK084(yu)005:1748: pa'o // rat+na ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma
NK084(yu)005:1749: h+aa tsan+da sa rba dush+tan ta ka ha na da
NK084(yu)005:1750: ha pa tsa h+aum h+aum h+aum phata /
NK084(yu)005:1751: ces pas rat+na rin po che ste lhor rat+na he
NK084(yu)005:1752: ru ka g.yas smug g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal thong
NK084(yu)005:1753: gshol rdo rje 'khor yug g.yas dung dmar dgra s+t+wa
NK084(yu)005:1754: ral gri g.yon na bsnams par bskyed do //
NK084(yu)005:1755: pad+ma ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+ta
NK084(yu)005:1756: sarba dush+tan ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa
NK084(yu)005:1758: ces pas nub tu pad+ma he ru ka g.yas ser
NK084(yu)005:1759: g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal dgra s+t+wa rdo rje 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1760: yug g.yas dung dmar gshol dang ral gri g.yon na
NK084(yu)005:1762: karma ma h+aa sh+ri he ru ka ma h+aa tsan+da
NK084(yu)005:1763: sarba dush+ta na ta ka ha na da ha pa
NK084(yu)005:1765: ces pas karma ni las te spyir sngags 'di rnams
NK084(yu)005:1766: kyi he ru ka zhes pa yan chad rtsa sngags
NK084(yu)005:1767: dang de man chad las sngags so //
NK084(yu)005:1768: de yang byang du karma he ru ka g.yas dmar
NK084(yu)005:1769: g.yon smug dbus ljang zhal ral gri rdo rje 'khor
NK084(yu)005:1770: yug g.yas dung dmar gshol dang dgra s+t+wa g.yon na
NK084(yu)005:1772: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri sarba dush+ta na h+aum phata /
NK084(yu)005:1773: ces pas yum khro mo dbang phyug ma smug nag g.yas 'khor lo g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1774: badz+ra d+ha ra ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri dz+wa
NK084(yu)005:1775: la ni h+aum phata yum badz+ra kro ti shwa ri
NK084(yu)005:1776: ma mthing nag g.yas rdo rje dang g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams
NK084(yu)005:1777: pa'o // su r+ya rat+na ma h+aa kro ti shwa
NK084(yu)005:1778: ri bi da ma h+aum phata yum rat+na kro d+hi
NK084(yu)005:1779: shwa ri ma ser mo g.yas rin chen g.yon b+han+d+ha'o
NK084(yu)005:1780: pa'o // // sh+ru ta sa man+ta pad+ma ba mu
NK084(yu)005:1781: ka ma h+aa kro ti shwa ri kha hi h+aum
NK084(yu)005:1782: phata yum pad+ma kro ti shwa ri ma dmar mo
NK084(yu)005:1783: g.yas pad+ma g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1784: sarba a mo g+ha kro ti shwa ri bi shwa
NK084(yu)005:1785: h+aum phata yum karma kro ti shwa ri ljang gu
NK084(yu)005:1786: g.yas rgya gram g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1787: gnas kyi ma mo brgyad phyir gdon pa'i sngags ni badz+ra koo'u ri ha /
NK084(yu)005:1788: zhes pas shar lho'i rtsibs mchan la ko ri ma
NK084(yu)005:1789: sngon mo g.yas byis pa'i dbyug pa g.yon b+han+d+ha dmar
NK084(yu)005:1790: gyis bkang ba'o // badz+ra tso ri ha lho nub
NK084(yu)005:1791: rtsibs mchan la tso ri ma ser mo mda' gzhu
NK084(yu)005:1792: gyis bkang ba'o // 'gengs pa'o // badz+ra pra mo
NK084(yu)005:1793: ha nub byang gi rtsibs mchan la pra mo ha
NK084(yu)005:1794: dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1795: badz+ra be ta li ha byang shar gyi rtsibsa mchan
NK084(yu)005:1796: la be ta li nag mo g.yas rdo rje 'phyar
NK084(yu)005:1797: ba g.yon byis pa'i ro za ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1798: badz+ra puska si ha shar lho'i gru chad la puska
NK084(yu)005:1799: si dmar ser byis pa'i rgyu ma g.yas kyis 'dren
NK084(yu)005:1800: pa'o // badz+ra ka sma ri ha lho nub gru
NK084(yu)005:1801: chad la kasma ri ljang gu g.yas rdo rje g.yon
NK084(yu)005:1802: dung chen dmar gyis bkang nas gsol ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1803: badz+ra sma sha ni ha nub byang gru chad la
NK084(yu)005:1804: sma sha ni mthing nag byis pa'i snying phyung nas
NK084(yu)005:1805: za ba'o // badz+ra tsan+d+ha li ha byang shar gyi
NK084(yu)005:1806: gru chad la tsan+d+ha li ser skya mchog gi mgo
NK084(yu)005:1807: za ba'o // lus phral ba'o // yul gyi phra
NK084(yu)005:1808: men brgyad phyir gdon pa'i sngags ni badz+ra seng ha
NK084(yu)005:1809: mu ka he zhes pa bar khyams dang po'i shar
NK084(yu)005:1810: du seng ha ma seng ge'i mgo can dkar mo
NK084(yu)005:1811: phyag gnyis gyen du bsnol te kha na ro za
NK084(yu)005:1812: za ba'o // lus phral ba'o // ba'o // badz+ra
NK084(yu)005:1813: bya g+h+ri mu kha he lhor bya gri ma ser
NK084(yu)005:1814: mo stag gi mgo can lag gnyis thur du bsnol
NK084(yu)005:1815: te zhing la 'bru tshugs su blta ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1816: badz+ra sri la mu ka he nub tu sri la
NK084(yu)005:1817: mu ka nag mo wa yi mgo can byis pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1818: khog pa kha phyes nas ldag pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1819: badz+ra shwa na mu ka he byang phyogs su shwa
NK084(yu)005:1820: na ma mthing ka spyang khu'i mgo can zhing gi
NK084(yu)005:1821: khog pa dral nas blta ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1822: badz+ra gri d+ha mu ka he shar lhor kri ta
NK084(yu)005:1823: ma dkar mo bya rgod kyi mgo can g.yas ral
NK084(yu)005:1824: gri g.yon b+han+d+ha'o // badz+ra kang+ka mu ka he lho
NK084(yu)005:1825: nub tu kang ka ma sku mdog dmar skya la
NK084(yu)005:1826: zhing phrag la bkal nas khur ba dur bya kang
NK084(yu)005:1828: badz+ra kha kha mu kha he nub byang du kha
NK084(yu)005:1829: kha ma nag mo bya rog mgo can g.yas gri
NK084(yu)005:1831: badz+ra hu lu mu ka he byang shar du hu
NK084(yu)005:1832: lu ka 'ug pa'i mgo can sku mdog sna tshogs
NK084(yu)005:1833: g.yas rdo rje lcags kyu g.yon b+han+d+ha dmar gyis bkang
NK084(yu)005:1834: ba'o // sgo ma bzhi 'don pa'i sngags ni badz+ra
NK084(yu)005:1835: ar+ya te dza te dza shar gyi sgo nang du
NK084(yu)005:1836: rta gdong ma dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren pa'i tshul
NK084(yu)005:1837: ba'o // lo // badz+ra a mu ka h+aum lhor phag gdong ma ser mo zhags pa thogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1838: badz+ra lo ka ba nub tu rdo rje 'jig rten
NK084(yu)005:1839: ma dmar mo dred kyi mgo can lcags sgrog gi
NK084(yu)005:1840: dmigs nyi ma skang ba phyag na bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1841: badz+ra ba smi pa la ya ba to ho byang
NK084(yu)005:1842: du thal byed ma ljang khu dril bu dkrol ba
NK084(yu)005:1844: dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskyed pa'i sngags ni /
NK084(yu)005:1845: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK084(yu)005:1846: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK084(yu)005:1847: b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo /
NK084(yu)005:1850: dbang mo las las grub pa yin pas mkha' nas
NK084(yu)005:1851: mi bskyed par rtsa sngags kyi b+h+yo nyi shu rtsa
NK084(yu)005:1852: brgyad brjod pas byon par bsam mo //
NK084(yu)005:1853: de la gsum ste phyi srin mo'i cha lugs su gnas pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1854: nang mgo brnyan gyi cha lugs su dang /
NK084(yu)005:1855: gsang ba khro mo'i cha lugs su bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1856: phyi srin mo'i cha lugs ni srin mo smug nag
NK084(yu)005:1857: rdo rje thod rlon 'chang zhes pa la sogs pa
NK084(yu)005:1858: ste he ru ka'i gal po las bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1859: nang mgo brnyan gyi cha lugs ni mi srin dmar
NK084(yu)005:1860: ser tri shul zhing chen g.yag ces pa la sogs
NK084(yu)005:1861: pa'o // gsang ba khro mo'i cha lugs su bshad
NK084(yu)005:1862: pa ni zhal gsum phyag drug tu bshad pa ste
NK084(yu)005:1863: lha mo sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las bshad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:1864: 'dir ni byon tshul gang yang 'dra ste ru tra
NK084(yu)005:1865: 'dul ba'i dus srin mor gnas pas khro bo 'chol
NK084(yu)005:1866: ba'i dus su srin mor bya /
NK084(yu)005:1867: rnal 'byor pas sgrub ste las la mngags pa'i dus
NK084(yu)005:1868: su mgo brnyan du byas te mgo brnyan du bya
NK084(yu)005:1869: / gsang ba rang sems rtogs pa'i dus na khro mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad du bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1870: lnga pa bsgoms pa'i che ba bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:1871: sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas //
NK084(yu)005:1872: rnam grol rim pas thob par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)005:1873: dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs pa'i //
NK084(yu)005:1874: smos ci dgos te de nyid yin //
NK084(yu)005:1875: zhes pa ste phyag rgya bya ba'i rgyu ni sa
NK084(yu)005:1876: la sogs pa zhes pas rab gser dang dngul dang
NK084(yu)005:1878: 'bring ni dar ram ras sam za 'og gam shing la bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1879: tha ma ni rdo dang sa dang rwa la bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:1880: de la lder tsho'am bris sam tsha tsha'am phyag rgyar
NK084(yu)005:1881: byas nas rab tu gnas pa byas na rgyu bzang
NK084(yu)005:1882: ngan dang bsam pa dag ma dag gi dbang gis
NK084(yu)005:1883: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rim pas thob par
NK084(yu)005:1884: 'gyur ba yin na zhes dpe bstan nas /
NK084(yu)005:1885: 'dir lta ba rtogs nas de bzhin nyid kyi dus
NK084(yu)005:1886: dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye
NK084(yu)005:1888: kun snang gi dus na snying rje sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1889: rgyus dus na yi ge'i 'phro 'dus sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1890: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dus na sgo gsum rdo rje gsum du sbyangs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1891: phyag rgya spros pa'i dus na rtog tshogs thams cad lha'i dal du sbyangs pa ste /
NK084(yu)005:1892: de ltar sbyangs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba
NK084(yu)005:1893: lta smos kyang ci dgos te ting nge 'dzin mngon
NK084(yu)005:1894: sum du phyung ba de nyid 'bras bu yin pas
NK084(yu)005:1895: gzhan nas btsal du med do zhes don bstan pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1896: // gnyis pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs pa la sogs pa la bdun te /
NK084(yu)005:1898: rig pa'i me tog dor ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1900: sngags kyis mchod pa 'bul ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1901: dam ye gnyis med du bstim pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1903: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad bstan pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:1906: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK084(yu)005:1907: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
NK084(yu)005:1908: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:1909: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK084(yu)005:1910: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK084(yu)005:1911: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:1912: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)005:1913: nye bar gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog /
NK084(yu)005:1914: ru lu ru lu h+aum b+h+yo h+aum /
NK084(yu)005:1915: e ha ya hi a na ya dzahh+aum bam ho /
NK084(yu)005:1917: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te /
NK084(yu)005:1918: de la ngo bo gang spyan drangs na phyogs bcu
NK084(yu)005:1919: dang dus bzhi dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad
NK084(yu)005:1920: ye nas sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs
NK084(yu)005:1921: rgyas pa'i bdag nyid du gnyis su med cing tha
NK084(yu)005:1922: mi dad pas na bdag nyid che ba'am chen po'o
NK084(yu)005:1923: // yul gang las spyan drangs na ci'i ngo bor
NK084(yu)005:1924: yang mi dmigs pa'i thugsa rang byung gi ye shes
NK084(yu)005:1925: ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK084(yu)005:1926: chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor de
NK084(yu)005:1927: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas dang
NK084(yu)005:1928: gzigs pa'i gnas yin pas de nas spyan drangs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:1929: // gang spyan drang na de ltar rtogs pa'i rig
NK084(yu)005:1930: pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir phyogs bcu dus
NK084(yu)005:1931: bzhi'i bdag nyid chen po dpal khrag 'thung gi dkyil
NK084(yu)005:1932: 'khor ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad
NK084(yu)005:1933: // spyan drang ngo // gang du spyan drang na
NK084(yu)005:1934: sems can gyi rig pa rang snang ba dang de
NK084(yu)005:1935: bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes dbyer
NK084(yu)005:1936: med pa'i rig pa rang snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)005:1937: gyi dkyil 'khor snang la rang bzhin med pa'i gnas
NK084(yu)005:1939: dus ji tsam na tshul lam thabs ji ltar spyan
NK084(yu)005:1940: drang na lta ba rtogs pa'i don la rnal 'byor
NK084(yu)005:1941: ba'i rkyen 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin las
NK084(yu)005:1942: bud+d+ha'i mtshan nyid dang rnal 'byor pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam
NK084(yu)005:1943: par sbyor ba ni shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin
NK084(yu)005:1944: sbyar nas bskal ba'i sgrib pa sbyong ba dang tshogs
NK084(yu)005:1945: gsog pa'i rten du dus da lta kho nar spyan
NK084(yu)005:1946: drangs pa'o // phyi pa ltar lha ye shes sems
NK084(yu)005:1947: dpa' dang bdag dam tshig sems dpa' gnyis spun dang
NK084(yu)005:1948: grogs po ltar lta ba ma yin te phyogs bcu
NK084(yu)005:1949: dus bzhi kun nas 'gro don du gshegs pa yi
NK084(yu)005:1950: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rang rig pa rang snang
NK084(yu)005:1951: bas bdag dang lha gnyis su med pas spyan drang
NK084(yu)005:1952: drangs pa'o // bar bya'o // bdag gis rgyal ba'i
NK084(yu)005:1953: dkyil 'khor la tshe snga ma ba snyen pa'i rim
NK084(yu)005:1954: pa rdzogs par phul ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:1955: da lta bdag dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha nye bar
NK084(yu)005:1956: gyur pa dang bsnyen pa rab tu rdzogsa par bya
NK084(yu)005:1957: ba'i phyir te da lta bdag dang nye bar gyur
NK084(yu)005:1958: pa ni bde bar gshegs pa yang 'gro don mdzad
NK084(yu)005:1959: par thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa las mi
NK084(yu)005:1960: 'da' ba'i dam tshig mchoga gi dbang gis byon pa
NK084(yu)005:1961: yin no // ye shes lnga ste khrag 'thung rigs
NK084(yu)005:1962: lnga yab yum gyi snying po ru lu gnas kyi
NK084(yu)005:1963: ma brgyad ru lu 'og ma yul gyi phra men
NK084(yu)005:1964: brgyad h+aum sgo ma bzhi b+h+yo dbang mo nyi shu
NK084(yu)005:1966: de bas na dpal chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'i snying po'o //
NK084(yu)005:1967: e h+ya ya hi kye kye zhes bos pa'o a na ya ni tshur gshegs zhes spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:1968: dzah+aum bam ho ni bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis
NK084(yu)005:1969: lha'i thugs ka nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang
NK084(yu)005:1970: lcags sgrog dang dril bus spyan drang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:1971: de yang ra zhes pas mdun gyi nam mkha' la
NK084(yu)005:1972: sprin phung bzhin du me ri 'dab 'byor tsam du
NK084(yu)005:1973: spyan drang ba'o // gnyis pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:1974: badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya h+aum /
NK084(yu)005:1975: badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phata /
NK084(yu)005:1976: zhes pa ste bdag dam tshig pa dang lha ye
NK084(yu)005:1977: shes pa gnyis ka sku dang ye shes tsam du
NK084(yu)005:1978: gsal la rtog pa ni rig pa'i me tog dor
NK084(yu)005:1979: ba'o // de yang bdag ye nas sangs rgyas yin
NK084(yu)005:1980: pa la ma rig pas sgribs pas ma shes te
NK084(yu)005:1981: de'i don da lta kho na rig pas bdag la
NK084(yu)005:1982: spyan 'dren no snyam pa kho na la rig pa'i
NK084(yu)005:1983: me tog dor ba zhes gdags so //
NK084(yu)005:1985: khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa //
NK084(yu)005:1986: thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)005:1987: 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che //
NK084(yu)005:1988: da lta nyid du bdag la gsol //
NK084(yu)005:1992: zhes pa ste ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin thugs rgyud bskul ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:1993: ru tra dregs pa can las dang nyon mongs pas
NK084(yu)005:1994: khro ba de la dpal chen pos khros pa'i skur
NK084(yu)005:1995: bstan pas kho'i zhe sdang gi dbang gis khro ba
NK084(yu)005:1996: de btul nas ru tra de'i gzung 'dzin gyi spros
NK084(yu)005:1998: de ltar khro bo'i skur ston pa de yang zhe
NK084(yu)005:1999: sdang gi dbang gis khros pa lta bu ma yin
NK084(yu)005:2000: te sems can zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur pa
NK084(yu)005:2001: la thabs gzhan gyis thul bar mi 'a gyur bas
NK084(yu)005:2002: thugs rje'i dbang gis khro bo'i sku dpal chen po
NK084(yu)005:2003: rngam pa'i tshogs su bstan pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:2004: yang na kho'i mgon du gyur pas na thugs rje
NK084(yu)005:2005: bsgral bya de dag bla na med pa'i sa la
NK084(yu)005:2006: bkod pas dpal dang grags dang phun sum tshogs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2007: // rtogs pa dang thugs rje'i rtags su me 'bar
NK084(yu)005:2008: ba'i klong na bzhugs pa de lta bu'i byin rlabs
NK084(yu)005:2009: ni 'jig rten gsum na med pas rmad po cha'o
NK084(yu)005:2010: // // de lta bu'i sku gsung thugs shin tu
NK084(yu)005:2011: rngams pa'i nga ro dang bcas pa'i dpal chen po
NK084(yu)005:2012: 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas sku gsung thugs bsam
NK084(yu)005:2013: gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs rmad
NK084(yu)005:2014: du byung ba de dus da lta nyid du bdag
NK084(yu)005:2015: gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dal la gsol cig ces
NK084(yu)005:2017: badz+ra kro ta ye shes khro bos sa ma ya
NK084(yu)005:2018: s+t+wam dam tshig gsal ba'i dus la bab ces dang
NK084(yu)005:2019: badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya phata ye shes khro
NK084(yu)005:2020: ba'i dam tshig gis bgegs brlag par mdzod cig /
NK084(yu)005:2021: badz+ra kro ta sa ma ya h'u ye shes khro
NK084(yu)005:2022: bo'i dam tshig gis dngos grub stsol cig zhes pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2024: a li u li ta li ta pa li dam
NK084(yu)005:2025: sh+tam g+ho na ro'u tri kha ram yo gi ni
NK084(yu)005:2026: kha hi ho / zhes pa ste a li bza'
NK084(yu)005:2027: ba dang bca' ba u li btung ba ta li
NK084(yu)005:2028: spyan gzigs ta pa li mur ba damsh+tam mche ba
NK084(yu)005:2029: can g+ho na yon tan ro'u dbang mo tri rag
NK084(yu)005:2030: mo kha ram gsol yo gi ni rnal 'byor ma
NK084(yu)005:2031: kha hi gsol ho dgyes pa ste /
NK084(yu)005:2032: don du bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba
NK084(yu)005:2033: dang mur ba'i rnam pa nyid 'dod yon gyi lha
NK084(yu)005:2034: mor byin gyis brlabs te zhal 'bar ba'i tshogs dang
NK084(yu)005:2035: yon tan drag mo rnams gsol cig zhes 'bul ba'i
NK084(yu)005:2037: h+aum ha he phata b+h+yo ram /
NK084(yu)005:2039: h+aum rigs lnga ha ma mo he phra men phata
NK084(yu)005:2040: sgo ma b+h+yo dbang mo ra zhes pas me ri
NK084(yu)005:2041: 'dab 'byor du bzhugs yod pa de dbyer med du
NK084(yu)005:2042: bstim nas dam ye gnyis med du sgom pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2044: smug nag sngo nag ser nag dang //
NK084(yu)005:2045: dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku //
NK084(yu)005:2046: dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bsgrad //
NK084(yu)005:2047: ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon //
NK084(yu)005:2048: rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs bar sgrogs //
NK084(yu)005:2049: sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zla bcas //
NK084(yu)005:2051: rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang //
NK084(yu)005:2052: ral gri dgra s+t+wa gshol la sogs //
NK084(yu)005:2053: rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams //
NK084(yu)005:2055: gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //
NK084(yu)005:2056: sgo bzhi'i phyag rgya rab mdzes shing //
NK084(yu)005:2057: slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs //
NK084(yu)005:2058: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes //
NK084(yu)005:2059: rang gi gdan dang lag cha dang //
NK084(yu)005:2060: ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas //
NK084(yu)005:2061: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas //
NK084(yu)005:2062: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:2063: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
NK084(yu)005:2065: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te spyir sku mdog la gsum ste rang bzhin gyi sku mdog dang /
NK084(yu)005:2067: de la rang bzhin ni snum pa dang 'dril ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2068: rigs kyi mdog ni smug pa dang sngo ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang ljang khu'o //
NK084(yu)005:2069: 'phrin las ni las thams cad zhi drag bzhi por byed pas na nag zhes 'byung ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2070: de la bud+d+ha he ru ka smug nag ste zhi
NK084(yu)005:2071: ba'i 'phrin las rdzogs shing mthar phyin par mdzad pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2072: // badz+ra he ru ka sngo nag gam mthing nag ste chos kyi dbyings mi 'gyur bas nag go //
NK084(yu)005:2073: rat+na he ru ka sera nag ste rgyas pa'i las mdzad pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2074: pad+ma he ru ka dmar nag ste dbang gi las mdzad do //
NK084(yu)005:2075: karma he ru ka ljang nag ste drag po'i las mdzad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2076: de dag thams cad shin tu khros pa 'jigs gzugs rngam pa'i sku yi rnam pa can no //
NK084(yu)005:2077: dbu gsum gyi g.yas thams cad chos sku mtshon g.yon
NK084(yu)005:2078: thams cad sprul sku mtshon dbus thams cad langs sku
NK084(yu)005:2079: mtshon te kha dog ni dbus ma thams cad rang
NK084(yu)005:2080: rang gi sku dang mthun no //
NK084(yu)005:2081: g.yas g.yon gnyis ni gnas 'phrog brtsi ste bud+d+ha'i zhal g.yas karma'i g.yon rat+na'i 'phrog des kun 'agre'o //
NK084(yu)005:2082: phyag drug ni ye shes drug gam pha rol tu phyin pa drug mtshon no //
NK084(yu)005:2083: zhabs bzhir bsgrad pa ni tshad med bzhi'am rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
NK084(yu)005:2084: bgo ba'i gos gsum ni khyad par thugs rje'i gos glang po che'i ko rlon dang /
NK084(yu)005:2085: phyi nang gsang ba gsum du sdud pa'i gos zhing gi g.yang gzhi dang /
NK084(yu)005:2086: mdzad pa 'phrin las kyi gos ni stag gi sham thabs so //
NK084(yu)005:2087: gzhan yang dbang gi bse khrab sogs gos sna tshogs gyon pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2088: gsung shin tu rngam pas 'byung po thams cad zhe gcod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2089: de yang a la dang ha la dang phata phata
NK084(yu)005:2090: dang b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes rngam pa'i sgra skad chen po
NK084(yu)005:2092: gdab pa'i tshom bu gsum ni don dam bcud kyi
NK084(yu)005:2093: thig le zhal 'gram du zhag gi zo ris dang
NK084(yu)005:2094: 'dul byed 'phrin las kyi rgyan dpral par thal chen
NK084(yu)005:2095: thig le dang dam sri bran du 'khol ba sna
NK084(yu)005:2097: gdags pa'i rgyan gsum ni dug lnga ma spangs gnas
NK084(yu)005:2098: su dag pas sprul rigs bzhis dbu dang dpung pa
NK084(yu)005:2099: dang phyag dang zhabs dang sku rags byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2100: sku gsum mtshon pa'i rtags su thod rlon gyi 'phreng
NK084(yu)005:2101: ba dang thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang thod pa
NK084(yu)005:2102: ra ris se ral khar byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2103: thabs dang shes rab mtshon pa'i rtags su dbu la nyi ma dang zla ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2104: phyir khro bo gdul bya dang mthun par don mdzad
NK084(yu)005:2105: pas phyag mtshan yang ma nges par bsnams pa ste
NK084(yu)005:2106: gang zag lam pa rnams sgom bde ba'i phyir na
NK084(yu)005:2107: rtsa rgyud du gnas 'phrog rtsi ba dang bshad rgyud
NK084(yu)005:2108: kyis kha bskang ba gnyis so //
NK084(yu)005:2109: rtsa rgyud du gnas 'phro rtsi na rang rtags kyi
NK084(yu)005:2110: phyag mtshan dang por ston te gzhan gnas 'phrog go
NK084(yu)005:2111: // bshad rgyud kyi kha bskang ba ni sgyu 'phrul
NK084(yu)005:2112: rdo rje dang bla ma dang lha mo sgyu 'phrul
NK084(yu)005:2114: de la dgongs pa'i dbang du byas na chos nyid
NK084(yu)005:2115: rang rtags kyi phyag mtshan don skye med ston par
NK084(yu)005:2116: dgongs pa dang / rgyal byed dpa' rtags kyi phyag
NK084(yu)005:2117: mtshan ru tra gdug pa chom par dgongs pa dang
NK084(yu)005:2118: dgongs pa dang / / 'dul thabs mtshan ma'i phyag mtshan gang la gang mos su bsnams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2119: de las 'dir rtsa rgyud nas bsdus pas gnas 'phrog rtsi'o //
NK084(yu)005:2120: de la stong gi 'jig rten 'khora yug bcas pa ni bud+d+ha he ru ka'i 'o //
NK084(yu)005:2121: rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka'i dang dung chen gang ba yab kyi g.yon thams cad dang yum gyi'o //
NK084(yu)005:2122: ral gri karma he ru ka'i dgra s+t+wa pad+ma'i thong
NK084(yu)005:2123: gshol rat+na'i la sogs zhes pa ni gnas yul gyi
NK084(yu)005:2124: phyag mtshan te rigs lnga dang gnas yul gyi ma
NK084(yu)005:2125: mo rnams kyis rang rang gi lag cha sna tshogas
NK084(yu)005:2126: pa bsnams pa'o // yum rnams la spyad par bya
NK084(yu)005:2127: ba'i don gyis na btsun mo'i zhes gsung la khro
NK084(yu)005:2128: mo'i gzugs su snang bas na 'jigs pa'i tshogas te
NK084(yu)005:2129: sku mdog ni so so'i gtso bo dang mthun g.yas
NK084(yu)005:2130: yab la 'khyud cing g.yon b+han+d+ha bsnams nas yab yum
NK084(yu)005:2132: gnas ni rnam par shes par tshogs brgyad de de'i
NK084(yu)005:2133: rang bzhin ye nas khro mo brgyad yin la de
NK084(yu)005:2134: ltar rtogs nas sgoms pa'i dus na yang khro mo
NK084(yu)005:2136: yul gyi phyag rgya phra men brgyad ni blta bar
NK084(yu)005:2137: bya ba'i yul gzugs sgra la sogs pa brgyad do
NK084(yu)005:2138: // de'i rang bzhin phra men ma brgyad de ye
NK084(yu)005:2139: nas gnas pa mngon du byas pa dang sgom pa'i
NK084(yu)005:2140: dus na yang de ltar du snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2141: yan lag bzhi ni sgo ma bzhi'i sku'am phyag rgya
NK084(yu)005:2142: ru rab tu mdzes shing gsal ba ste lus kyi
NK084(yu)005:2143: dbang po bzhi la gnas pa dang de'i rang bzhin
NK084(yu)005:2144: sgo ma bzhi yin pa dang ye nas gnas pa
NK084(yu)005:2145: de mngon du byas te sgom pa de ltar snang
NK084(yu)005:2146: ngo // slas ni dbang mo nyer brgyad chung mar
NK084(yu)005:2147: byas nas bar khyams la bkod pa dang dpal chen
NK084(yu)005:2148: pos ru tra bsgral ba'i dus na srin mo rnams
NK084(yu)005:2149: dang rol ba mdzad pas byi mo'am bran ma ni
NK084(yu)005:2150: bran du khas blangs nas lhag ma byin par byas
NK084(yu)005:2151: ngo // pa'o // de'i tshogs ni gang zhe na
NK084(yu)005:2152: bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad sdom pas nyi shu rtsa
NK084(yu)005:2153: brgyad de dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis
NK084(yu)005:2154: dkyil 'khor mdzes par byas shing bar khyams phyi ma
NK084(yu)005:2155: la rang rang gi gnas na mdzes par gnas shing
NK084(yu)005:2156: ngo // pa'o // 'khod do // de rnams ni
NK084(yu)005:2157: rang rang gi gdan zhing rkyang re dang bcas nas
NK084(yu)005:2158: 'phrin las kyi las mdzad pa'i lag cha dang bcas
NK084(yu)005:2159: 'phrin las ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdag cag gis
NK084(yu)005:2160: sgrub na ci bagyi zhesa zer nas ni chas te
NK084(yu)005:2161: bar khyams phyi ma la rang rang gi gdan bting
NK084(yu)005:2162: ba'i steng du bzhugs pa'i phyir na gnas zhes bya'o
NK084(yu)005:2164: bstan pa de ltar lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams gsal bar
NK084(yu)005:2165: bkod nas sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyan dang cha
NK084(yu)005:2167: chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dbus med par nam mkhas
NK084(yu)005:2168: gar khyab sar khyab la nam mkha' ni mtha' dbus
NK084(yu)005:2169: med pa chos kyi dbyings so //
NK084(yu)005:2170: de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyis gar khyab pa yi
NK084(yu)005:2171: 'jig rten drug ni rigs drug gi 'jig rten drug
NK084(yu)005:2172: gi phyogs bcu thams cad na dkyil 'khor gsal bar
NK084(yu)005:2173: snang ba ni dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2174: don dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rtags
NK084(yu)005:2175: me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
NK084(yu)005:2177: 'di snang ba rnam 'byed kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2178: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyud las /
NK084(yu)005:2180: byang chub sems las ma yengs na //
NK084(yu)005:2181: dkyil 'khor snying po lhun grub pas //
NK084(yu)005:2182: thams cad dus gcig sgom par 'gyur //
NK084(yu)005:2184: bdun pa bstod pa la bdun las dang po sku la bstod pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2186: gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar //
NK084(yu)005:2188: khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin //
NK084(yu)005:2189: mche ba zang yag za byed che ho //
NK084(yu)005:2190: zhes pa ste h+aum ni sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir mgo 'dren pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2191: gtum pa ni gzi brjid chen po'i sku gtum pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2192: 'jigs byed chen po'i gsung gtum pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2193: stobs po che'i thugs gtum pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2194: sgrol byed chen po'i phyag gtum pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2195: za byed chen po'i mche ba gtum pa ste de
NK084(yu)005:2196: yang dus mtha'i bskal ba 'jig pa'i dus kyi me
NK084(yu)005:2197: ltar 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2198: thabs mkhas pa'i 'od zera ba spu'i bu ga re re nas du ma 'byung ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2199: gdug pa sel ba'i 'od zer gsal bas sems can
NK084(yu)005:2200: gyi gti mug gi mun pa sel ba dang thugs
NK084(yu)005:2201: rje chen po'i 'od zer thams cad du khyab par
NK084(yu)005:2202: mdzad pa'o // de ni dper na nyi ma 'bum
NK084(yu)005:2203: dus gcig la nam mkha' la shar ba'i gzi brjid
NK084(yu)005:2204: mdzad pa'o // lta bu'o // dbang du bsdus pa'i khro gnyer ni bsdus pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2205: thabs la mkhas pa'i khro gnyer ni g.yo ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2206: zil gyis gnon pa'i khro gnyer ni 'greng ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2207: de dag kyang dper na glog stong dus gcig la nam mkha' la 'gyu ba bzhina no //
NK084(yu)005:2208: mche ba zang yag tu gtsigs pa las gdug pa
NK084(yu)005:2209: 'dul ba'i mche ba ni dkar la rtsa dmar ba'i
NK084(yu)005:2211: za byed chen po'i mche ba ni gtsigs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2212: skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i mche ba ni rno la dkar ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2213: de lta bu'i che ba'i yon tan la dgyes pas ho zhes pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2214: gnyis pa gsung la bstod pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2216: rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir //
NK084(yu)005:2217: stug chom ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad //
NK084(yu)005:2218: a la ha la'i gad rgyang can //
NK084(yu)005:2219: shugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho //
NK084(yu)005:2220: zhes pa ste h+aum la gsung lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir h+aum gis mgo drangs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2221: dpal khrag 'thung gi gsung rngam pa'i nga ro ni
NK084(yu)005:2222: dper na nam mkha' la 'brug stong dus gcig la
NK084(yu)005:2224: de yang zhal gsum nas g.yas chos sku skye med
NK084(yu)005:2225: don gyi gsung gis sems can bde ba la 'god
NK084(yu)005:2226: pa dang / g.yon longs sku'i gsung brag cha lta bu'i zil gyis gnon pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2227: dbus sprul sku'i gsung gang la gang 'dul du mdzad pa'i tshul yin no //
NK084(yu)005:2228: lha gshegs pa'i stug chom ni ldir ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2229: sprul pa 'gyed pa'i stug chom ni rigs pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2230: 'phrin las mdzad pa'i stug chom ni drag po'o //
NK084(yu)005:2231: de dag ni dper na ri raba 'bum dus gcig la bsnyil pa'i sgra skad dang 'dra ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2232: rngam pa'i gad mo a la la'o //
NK084(yu)005:2233: gtum pa'i gad mo ha la'o //
NK084(yu)005:2234: dgyes pa'i gad mo ha ha zhes pa'i gad rgyang che ba'am chen po sgrogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2235: 'khor sdud pa'i bshugs pa ni snyan pa dang gdug
NK084(yu)005:2236: pa 'dul ba'i bshugs pa ni drag pa dang byin
NK084(yu)005:2237: 'bebs pa'i bshugs pa mtsher la ring ba ste bshugs
NK084(yu)005:2238: pa'i sgra de dag la 'thor rlung ngam rlung nag
NK084(yu)005:2239: 'byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kun tu g.yeng
NK084(yu)005:2240: bar byed pas che ho zhes so //
NK084(yu)005:2241: gsum pa thugs la bstod pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2243: khro bo shes rab 'od po che //
NK084(yu)005:2244: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu rdzogs //
NK084(yu)005:2246: sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)005:2247: h+aum ni thugs ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2248: khro bo ni shes rab chen po stong pa nyid
NK084(yu)005:2249: kyi khro bo ste lta ba ngan pa 'joms pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2250: // de yang mnyam pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi
NK084(yu)005:2251: don rtogs pa thams la mkhas pa'i shes rab kyis
NK084(yu)005:2252: sprul pa sna tshogs su 'gyed pa dang rigs su
NK084(yu)005:2253: 'byed pa'i shes rab kyis tshad ma bka' gzhung gsungs
NK084(yu)005:2254: pa ste de la cis kyang mi sgribs pas na
NK084(yu)005:2256: thugs ye shes dkyil lta bu la ye shes bzhi'i
NK084(yu)005:2257: 'khor dang ldan pa de la dus dang gnas skabs
NK084(yu)005:2258: kun tu gzung 'dzin gyis ma sgrib pas gsal ba'o
NK084(yu)005:2259: // yang na gzhi'i ye shes rnam shes tshogs brgyad
NK084(yu)005:2260: dang lam gyi ye shes rnam pa lnga dang 'bras
NK084(yu)005:2261: bu'i ye shes chos kyi sku'o //
NK084(yu)005:2262: de dag ni ye shes chen po'i khro bo ste ma sgribs par 'od gsal ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2263: de yang ye shes lnga lhun gyis grub cing rdzogs
NK084(yu)005:2264: pa nyid phyi nang med par gsal ba yin no
NK084(yu)005:2265: // khro bo'i ye shes ni bsreg pa'i me ltar
NK084(yu)005:2266: 'bar ba'i ye shes kyi mes las dang nyon mongs
NK084(yu)005:2267: pa kun tu 'jomas shing cir snang thams cad thugs
NK084(yu)005:2269: ye shes dag gis bgegs thams cad bud shing dang 'dra bar 'joms pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2270: sna tshogs su snang yang chos kyi dbyings las ma
NK084(yu)005:2271: g.yos pas na ye shes so de la dbyer med
NK084(yu)005:2273: de yang sna tshogs su snang ba nyid rang snang
NK084(yu)005:2274: rang byung gi ye shes spros pa dang bral ba
NK084(yu)005:2275: nyid rang snang ba'i thugs rje ste ho ni de
NK084(yu)005:2276: la dgyes pa'o // bzhi pa yon tan la bstod pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2278: khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po //
NK084(yu)005:2281: sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che //
NK084(yu)005:2282: zhes yon tan lnga lhun gyis grub pa'i h+aum gis
NK084(yu)005:2283: mgo drang ste ye shes chen po'i sku rngam pa'i
NK084(yu)005:2284: phyir khro bo gzhan la dbang bsgyur ba ste bdud
NK084(yu)005:2285: dang mu stegs la sogs pa khro bo de las
NK084(yu)005:2286: rgyal bas na khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
NK084(yu)005:2287: de dag gi yon tan 'byung ba'i phyir sprin chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:2288: de yang sprin chen po las char 'bab pa ltar
NK084(yu)005:2289: de dag kyang thugs rje dbang gis khros pa'i dus
NK084(yu)005:2290: na khro bo'i tshogs nam mkha' gang bar char du
NK084(yu)005:2292: ji ltar na khros pa'i sprul pa ni khro bo
NK084(yu)005:2293: ste de ni sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ste char chen
NK084(yu)005:2294: po lta bur 'bebs par byed do //
NK084(yu)005:2295: khro bo dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang bcas pa ji
NK084(yu)005:2296: ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'byung ba ni dper na
NK084(yu)005:2297: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dgos 'dod
NK084(yu)005:2298: thams cad 'byung ba'i gter du gyur pa dang 'dra
NK084(yu)005:2299: ste sprin lta bur snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2300: yon tan sna tshogs mnga' ba'i khros pa'am khro bo
NK084(yu)005:2301: thams cad kyang don spros pa dang bral ba'i ye
NK084(yu)005:2303: dkyil 'khor mang po der gcig pas na thig le cha'o //
NK084(yu)005:2304: de lta bu'i don yang dag pa de la dgyes pas na ho zhes so //
NK084(yu)005:2305: lnga pa 'phrin las la bstod pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2307: bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po /
NK084(yu)005:2308: bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms //
NK084(yu)005:2310: 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho //
NK084(yu)005:2311: zhes pa ste h+aum ni 'phrin las lnga lhun gyis
NK084(yu)005:2312: grub pas mgo drang ba yin la bdud ni ru
NK084(yu)005:2313: tra ste de 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyi yang
NK084(yu)005:2314: bdud du gyur pa ni dpal chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:2315: ji ltar na ru tras sems can thams cad bsad
NK084(yu)005:2316: pas na sems can gyi bdud do de dpal chen
NK084(yu)005:2317: pos btul de lus gdan du byas pas na bdud
NK084(yu)005:2318: chen po'o // bdud ni ru tra la dpal he
NK084(yu)005:2319: ru ka ni de nyid kyi bdud ste bdud rnams
NK084(yu)005:2321: 'joms pa ni bdud de dag bsgral nas sha khrag
NK084(yu)005:2322: gsol sems 'og min du gnas spar nas bdud kyi
NK084(yu)005:2323: tshogs thams cad rab tu pham par byas nas bcom
NK084(yu)005:2324: pa'o // 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ru tra 'khor bcas so //
NK084(yu)005:2325: de dag kyang 'jigs par byed pa ni he ru
NK084(yu)005:2326: ka ste ji ltar na ru tra rnams kyi mgo
NK084(yu)005:2327: dang yan lag mang po dang dur khrod kyi rgyan
NK084(yu)005:2328: mang po btags nas 'jigs 'jigs 'dra ba la de
NK084(yu)005:2329: dpal chen po'i sku'i cha lugs kyi bred cing dngangs
NK084(yu)005:2330: nas 'jigs par byed pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:2331: de ltar 'jig byed chen po'i sku bstan kyang chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2332: de lta bu de chos nyid kyi don las ma
NK084(yu)005:2333: g.yos par 'jigs 'jigs 'dra bar 'byung ba la de
NK084(yu)005:2334: dag thams cad rang byung gi ye shes su 'dug
NK084(yu)005:2335: pas na thiga le chen po'o //
NK084(yu)005:2336: don la ci yang med pas de la dgyes pas ho zhe'o //
NK084(yu)005:2337: drug pa sbyir bstan pa ni /
NK084(yu)005:2339: rdo rje brag chen sra ba po //
NK084(yu)005:2340: rdo rje'i chu bo sdud chen po //
NK084(yu)005:2341: rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che //
NK084(yu)005:2342: rdo rje lung ste 'thor rlung che ho //
NK084(yu)005:2343: zhes pa ste bstod pa 'di la gsum ste bskal pa'i 'phrin las la bstod pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2344: 'byung ba dag byed la bstod pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2345: mtshan nyid yon tan la bstod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2346: dang po ni bskal pa me bdun chu gcig gis
NK084(yu)005:2347: 'jig pa de sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las yin te
NK084(yu)005:2348: / ji ltar na sems can gyi las ngan rgyun bcad nas gnas ngan las sgrol ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2349: ji ltar sgrol na sra ba brtan pa'i bskal bar
NK084(yu)005:2350: thams cad gnas zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas thams
NK084(yu)005:2351: cad 'khrud lhag mthong me yi bskal pas thams cad
NK084(yu)005:2352: bsregs ye shes rlung gis bskal bas thams cad 'thor
NK084(yu)005:2353: shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas rgas rgud stongs /
NK084(yu)005:2354: zhes mdo dgongs pa 'dus pa las gsungs so //
NK084(yu)005:2355: rgyud gzhan las kyang gsungs so //
NK084(yu)005:2356: gnyis pa ni bud+d+ha'i he ru ka'i thugs ye shes ni 'byung ba sa yin /
NK084(yu)005:2357: des sa tha mal pa 'joms pas bud+d+ha kro ti'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2358: de ltar rat+na chu pad+ma me karma rlung ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2359: gsum pa ni h+aum ni 'byung ba bzhi'i bdag nyid
NK084(yu)005:2360: de de yang 'byung ba bzhi po gnas su dag
NK084(yu)005:2361: pas yum bzhi / yum bzhi po yang chos nyid
NK084(yu)005:2362: skye 'jig dang bral bas don chos nyid kyi ngang
NK084(yu)005:2363: pas yum bzhi / du thim mo // de'i phyir h+aum gis mgo drangs pa yin no //
NK084(yu)005:2364: de yang dpal khrag 'thung la rdo rje lta bu'i
NK084(yu)005:2365: sku mnga' bas mtshan nyid skye 'jig las 'das pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2366: // de kho na dper na brag chen po dang 'dra bas sra ba po zhes /
NK084(yu)005:2367: de ltar yin yang thugs rje chen po'i rlan gyis
NK084(yu)005:2368: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bag chags 'khru
NK084(yu)005:2369: bas na ye shes chen po rdo rje'i chu bo
NK084(yu)005:2370: yin la des chu tha mal pa yang sdud par
NK084(yu)005:2371: byed pas na sdud chen po zhes so //
NK084(yu)005:2372: ye shes chen po rdo rje yi me dang 'dra
NK084(yu)005:2373: ba ste nyon mongs pa kun bsreg par mdzad pa
NK084(yu)005:2374: dang de yang 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du
NK084(yu)005:2375: ye shes kyi me 'bar bas na che ba'am chen
NK084(yu)005:2376: po'o // gdul bya rnams 'khor ba'i gnas nas mya
NK084(yu)005:2377: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su thugs rje chen pos
NK084(yu)005:2378: bskyod par mdzad pa dang 'gro ba rigs drug gi
NK084(yu)005:2379: sems can thams cad rdo rje yi rlung gis 'thor
NK084(yu)005:2380: nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la 'dogs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2381: po'o // // de ltar sems can gyi don byed
NK084(yu)005:2382: pa de gzhan gang gi yang 'og tu ma gyur
NK084(yu)005:2384: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa rlung gis sems can
NK084(yu)005:2385: gyi don byed pas na de la dgyes pas ho
NK084(yu)005:2386: zhes pa'o // gsum pa de nyid tshogs sgrub kyis bsgrub par bstan pa la dngos dang /
NK084(yu)005:2387: de ltar bsgrubs pas dngos grub 'thob tshul bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2389: yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan //
NK084(yu)005:2390: cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis //
NK084(yu)005:2392: nges par legs pa'i dgongs pa 'grub //
NK084(yu)005:2394: rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug la byang chub sems rnam
NK084(yu)005:2395: pa gnyis slob dpon drug mched bzhi sngags gsum phyag
NK084(yu)005:2396: rgya bzhi gsang ba bcu yan lag gi dam tshig
NK084(yu)005:2397: lnga spyad par bya ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2401: sgrub par bya ba ma nyams pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2402: yo byad lnga ni bro gar 'du 'phro'i yo byad dang /
NK084(yu)005:2404: glu tshig sgra yi yo byad dang /
NK084(yu)005:2406: a li ka li'i yo byad lnga dang ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2407: yang na sngags kyi yan lag lnga ste rtsa ba'i
NK084(yu)005:2408: lha dang thabs kyi lha dang shes rab kyi lha
NK084(yu)005:2409: dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang ye shes
NK084(yu)005:2411: des yo byad phun sum tshogs pa bstan no //
NK084(yu)005:2412: cho ga lnga ni de bzhin nyid stong pa chen po'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)005:2413: kun tu snang sgyu ma snying rje'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)005:2414: rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)005:2415: phyag rgya gcig pa lha bzhengs pa'i cho ga dang /
NK084(yu)005:2416: phyag rgya spros pa rnal 'byor rtsal sbyor ba'i cho
NK084(yu)005:2417: ga rnams rdzogs par shes pa yis zhes gtso bo
NK084(yu)005:2418: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan la /
NK084(yu)005:2419: rnal 'byor pa ni ston pa rdo rje rgyal po
NK084(yu)005:2420: yab yum dang rdo rje rgyal theb yab yum dang
NK084(yu)005:2421: las kyi gar ma yab yum dang rdo rje bya
NK084(yu)005:2422: rog yab yum dang rdul phyags skye bo'o //
NK084(yu)005:2423: de rnams 'tshogs nas sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni tshom
NK084(yu)005:2424: bu mang nyung lha grangs dang mi grangs su sbyar
NK084(yu)005:2425: nas dpa' bo dang dpa' mor bstun nas sgrub pa'i
NK084(yu)005:2426: dkyil 'khor gyis zhes gtso bo 'khor phun sum tshogs
NK084(yu)005:2427: pa bstan pa'o // de ni drang don ma yin
NK084(yu)005:2428: te nges pa'i don yin pas nges par the tshom
NK084(yu)005:2430: gang 'grub na mya ngan las 'das pa bud+d+ha'i dngos grub legs par 'grub /
NK084(yu)005:2431: don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa gang yin pa de 'grub /
NK084(yu)005:2432: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis kyang legs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK084(yu)005:2433: zhes dus phun tshogs bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2435: khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang //
NK084(yu)005:2436: pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs //
NK084(yu)005:2437: ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyis //
NK084(yu)005:2438: dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed //
NK084(yu)005:2440: de yang 'grub pa de rang gang zhe na khro
NK084(yu)005:2441: bo ni khrag 'thung rgyal ba rigs rnam pa lnga'o
NK084(yu)005:2442: // khro mo'i sgras ni yum lnga'o //
NK084(yu)005:2443: tshogs chen ni yab yum bcu po de yon tan
NK084(yu)005:2444: gyi tshogs mang po dang ldan pas 'khor ye shes
NK084(yu)005:2445: dang las las grub pa mang po yod pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2446: de yang 'khor gang zhe na pho nya ni ko'u
NK084(yu)005:2447: ri ma brgyad de bcol ba'i las rnams byed pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2448: // phyag brnyan ni seng ha ma brgyad de mngag pa'i las la mgyogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2449: bka' nyan ni sgo ma bzhi ste 'gugs 'dren gyi las la mkhas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2450: tshogs ni rang rang gi sprul pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:2451: ci bgyi ni dbang phyug ma ste rje dpal chen
NK084(yu)005:2452: mo'i bran yin pa'i phyir na ma bcol yang las
NK084(yu)005:2453: ci bgyi zer nas yong ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2454: la sogs ni dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2455: tshogsa rnams ni yang sprul dang bcas pa rnams so //
NK084(yu)005:2456: de rnams kyis rnal 'byor ba'i dngos grub rab 'bring
NK084(yu)005:2457: gsum dang las rnam pa bzhi po rnams ma lus
NK084(yu)005:2459: thun mong gi 'bras bu rig 'dzin bzhi bsgrod par byed /
NK084(yu)005:2460: mchog gi 'bras bu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
NK084(yu)005:2461: rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
NK084(yu)005:2462: byed do // bzhi pa mjug gi las la dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2465: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kun //
NK084(yu)005:2466: rang gi snying kar bsdu na ni //
NK084(yu)005:2467: h+aum h+aum zhes ni rab brjod pas //
NK084(yu)005:2468: 'dus pa de dag ci bder spyad //
NK084(yu)005:2470: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod bstod bzlas pa
NK084(yu)005:2471: rdzogs pa de nasa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor thams
NK084(yu)005:2472: cad kun bsdu ba ni bdag gi thugs ka nas
NK084(yu)005:2473: yi ge h+aum las 'od zer 'phros pas lha dang
NK084(yu)005:2474: gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa 'od du zhu nas
NK084(yu)005:2475: 'od de yang gzhal yas khang gi 'od lha'i 'od
NK084(yu)005:2476: la 'dus lha rnams kyi 'od rims kyis rang gi
NK084(yu)005:2477: snying kara bsdus nas ni bdag kyang 'od du zhu
NK084(yu)005:2478: nas mi dmigs par gyur te ma bsdus na dngos
NK084(yu)005:2479: grub g.yel bar 'gyur bas bsdu bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2480: de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'od du gsal bar bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2481: de yang dang po yang h+aum las byung bas tha
NK084(yu)005:2482: ma yang h+aum zhes ni rab tu brjod pas h+aum
NK084(yu)005:2483: la sdud pa'o // de ltar mi dmigs pa de'i
NK084(yu)005:2484: ngang las skad cig gis lha'i skur bskyed la kam
NK084(yu)005:2485: las rdo rje'i go khrab kyis lus la rdo rje'i
NK084(yu)005:2486: la sdud pa'o // go bgos / ham las rdo
NK084(yu)005:2487: rje'i rgyun thag gis bsdam a las rin po che
NK084(yu)005:2488: dang h+aum las rdo rje'i thag pa gnyis mdzub mo
NK084(yu)005:2490: rat+na ma le a bi shiny+tsa zhes pas rin po che'i 'phreng bas bcing /
NK084(yu)005:2491: sa ta lam zhes pas dar dpyangs dkar po g.yas su 'phur bar bsam mo //
NK084(yu)005:2492: a b+hi shiny+tsa lam zhes pas dar dpyangs dmar po g.yon du 'phur bar bsam mo //
NK084(yu)005:2493: 'dus pa de daga rtag mtha' bsal nas stong nyid
NK084(yu)005:2494: du chad mtha' bsal ba'i phyir ci bder spyod do
NK084(yu)005:2496: de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus nas kyang //
NK084(yu)005:2497: rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis //
NK084(yu)005:2498: spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par //
NK084(yu)005:2499: lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom //
NK084(yu)005:2500: zhes pa ste dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bstan pa'i rjes
NK084(yu)005:2501: de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdag la bsdus
NK084(yu)005:2502: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'og min du gshegs zin
NK084(yu)005:2503: nas kyang spyod lam bya bar bstan pa de yang
NK084(yu)005:2504: blo rnal ma la rig pa lha'i sku 'byor bas
NK084(yu)005:2505: rnal 'byor sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas
NK084(yu)005:2506: dang skal ba mnyam pas chen po de yis ji
NK084(yu)005:2507: ltar zhe na bor nas bzhag pa lta bu ma
NK084(yu)005:2508: yin te 'gro ba dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa
NK084(yu)005:2509: dang za ba'i spyod lam kun tu yang lha'i ting
NK084(yu)005:2510: nge 'dzin las ma nyams par rang nyid yi dam
NK084(yu)005:2511: lha yi ting nge 'dzin nyid du ni rtag tu
NK084(yu)005:2512: bsgom mo // ji ltar na 'gro na rkang pa'i
NK084(yu)005:2513: mthil du rdo rje sgoms nas 'gro des sems can
NK084(yu)005:2514: ltog pa'i 'gro la shi bo gnas ngan par mi
NK084(yu)005:2515: bsgom mo // skye / nyal na a zhes stong
NK084(yu)005:2516: nyid du nyal rmi lam sgyu ma tsam la sems
NK084(yu)005:2517: 'dzin des snang ba rmi lam tsam du shes /
NK084(yu)005:2518: 'dug na phyi snod gzhal yas khang la nang bcud
NK084(yu)005:2519: lha'i skur 'dug des rtog pa gnas 'gyur ba dag
NK084(yu)005:2520: par byed / za na yo byad tshogs su rol te zas kyi rnal 'byor bya /
NK084(yu)005:2521: de rnams gang byed kyang lha sgom dgos pas na
NK084(yu)005:2522: lha nyid du ni rtag tu sgom zhes gsungs pa
NK084(yu)005:2523: yin no // gnyis pa dag mnyam bden pa dbyer
NK084(yu)005:2524: med rang bzhin lhun grub kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa
NK084(yu)005:2525: la gsum ste kun rdzob dag pa chen po'i rang
NK084(yu)005:2527: de nyid gtan tshigs rnam pa bzhis don dam mnyam
NK084(yu)005:2528: pa chen po dang dbyer med du bstan pa dang
NK084(yu)005:2529: / de ltar dag mnyam dbyer med rtogs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2531: phung po lnga nyid khro rgyal gtso //
NK084(yu)005:2532: chen po lnga nyid dbang phyug yum //
NK084(yu)005:2533: skye mched khams rnams mang po kun //
NK084(yu)005:2534: thugs rje rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs //
NK084(yu)005:2535: zhes pa ste phung po lnga nyid ni gzugs kyi phung po bud+d+ha he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)005:2536: rnam shes kyi phung po badz+ra he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)005:2537: tshor ba'i phung po rat+na he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)005:2538: 'du shes kyi phung po pad+ma he ru ka'o //
NK084(yu)005:2539: 'du byed kyi phung po karma he ru ste khro rgyal gtso bo lnga yin la /
NK084(yu)005:2540: chen po lnga nyid ni yum ste de yang 'byung
NK084(yu)005:2541: ba sa ni badz+ra kro ti shwa ri ma ste
NK084(yu)005:2542: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi spyad bya ste
NK084(yu)005:2543: yum mo // 'byung ba nam mkha' ni yum bud+d+ha kro ti ste nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)005:2544: chu ni rat+na kro ti ste tshor ba'i yum mo //
NK084(yu)005:2545: 'du shes me'i yum pad+ma kro ti'o //
NK084(yu)005:2546: 'du byed rlung gi rang bzhin gyis spyad bya'i yul
NK084(yu)005:2547: du gyur pas na yum karma kro ti shwa ri
NK084(yu)005:2548: ma'o // de bas na phung po lnga yab 'byung ba lnga dbang phyug yum lnga'i rang bzhin no //
NK084(yu)005:2549: skye mched ni gnas kyi ma brgyad dang khams rnams
NK084(yu)005:2550: mang po kun zhes pas yum gyi phra men brgyad
NK084(yu)005:2551: de re re la gnyis gnyis brtsis pas mig gi
NK084(yu)005:2552: rnam shes ko'u ri rna ba'i rnam shes tso ri
NK084(yu)005:2553: sna'i rnam shes pra mo ha lce'i rnam shes pe
NK084(yu)005:2554: ta li / mig gi dbang po push+ka si rna
NK084(yu)005:2555: ba'i dbang po kasma ri sna'i dbang po sma sha
NK084(yu)005:2556: ni lce'i dbang po tsan+d+ha li'o //
NK084(yu)005:2557: de bas na rnam pa bzhi dang /
NK084(yu)005:2558: dbang po bzhi ni rang rang gi gnas la spyod pas na gnas kyi ma mo brgyad do //
NK084(yu)005:2559: de rnams la skye mched brgyad ces bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2560: khams ni mig gi yul ni gzugs kyi khams te
NK084(yu)005:2561: seng ha ma rna ba'i yul sgra'i khams te bya
NK084(yu)005:2562: tri ma sna'i yul dri'i khams te sri la ma
NK084(yu)005:2563: lce'i yul ro'i khams te shwa na ma mig gi
NK084(yu)005:2564: dbang po'i spyad bya 'das pa ste kri ta ma
NK084(yu)005:2565: rna ba'i da lta ste kang ka ma sna'i ma
NK084(yu)005:2566: byon pa ste kha kha ma lce 'byung bar ma
NK084(yu)005:2567: nges par ste hu lu ma /
NK084(yu)005:2568: lus kyi dbang po bzhi ni sgo ma bzhi yin no //
NK084(yu)005:2569: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje khros shing
NK084(yu)005:2570: rngam pa'i dkyil badz+ra he ru ka la 'khor ma
NK084(yu)005:2571: tshogs mang po de ye nas rang chas su lhun
NK084(yu)005:2574: rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul //
NK084(yu)005:2575: byin gyis rlabs dang mngon sum pa //
NK084(yu)005:2576: rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis //
NK084(yu)005:2577: thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che //
NK084(yu)005:2579: de yang rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi la don bzhi
NK084(yu)005:2580: ste lta ba dang sbyar ba'i rtogs pa bzhi dang
NK084(yu)005:2581: / bskyed rim dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2582: rdzogs rim dang sbyar ba dang /
NK084(yu)005:2584: lta ba dang sbyar ba'i rtogs pa bzhi la re re la don gsum gsum ste /
NK084(yu)005:2585: de la rgyu gcig par rtogs pa'i gzhal bya ni
NK084(yu)005:2586: 'khor 'das kyi zhen snang la 'jog pa'o bzhi ka
NK084(yu)005:2587: mthun no // go ba'am rtogs pa gang skye ba
NK084(yu)005:2588: ni 'khor 'das sems nyid du rgyu gcig par rtogs
NK084(yu)005:2589: mthun no // pa'o // zhen pa gang grol ba
NK084(yu)005:2590: ni 'khor 'das tha dad du zhen pa grol ba'o
NK084(yu)005:2591: mthun no // pa'o // // yig 'bru'i tshul du
NK084(yu)005:2592: rtogs pa'i go ba'am rtogs pa gang bskyed pa ni
NK084(yu)005:2593: yi ge 'bru gsum gyi sgo nas lus ngag yid
NK084(yu)005:2594: gsum sku gsung thugs su rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2595: zhen pa ni 'bras bu gzhan nas brob bam snyam nas gzhan nas tshol ba'i zhen pa grol /
NK084(yu)005:2596: byin gyi rlabs kyis rtogs pa'i rtogs pa gang skye
NK084(yu)005:2597: ba ni rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul gyis
NK084(yu)005:2598: sku gsung thugs su rtogs pa'i mthu ngo shes nas
NK084(yu)005:2600: zhen pa mi ldan pa'i zhen pa las grol nas ldan pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2601: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni mthu ngo shes mi
NK084(yu)005:2602: ldan pa ldan par rtogs pa de sgra tsam ma
NK084(yu)005:2603: yin par blo gting du go ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2604: zhen pa gang grol ba ni sgra bzhin du 'dzin pa'i zhen pa las grol lo //
NK084(yu)005:2605: bskyed rim dang sbyar na rgyu gcig par rtogs pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)005:2606: byin gyis brlabs ni kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)005:2607: yig 'bru'i tshul ni rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)005:2608: mngon sum par rtogs pa ni lha'i sku bskyed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2609: lha gsal ba la rab tu rtogs pa zhes bzhed do //
NK084(yu)005:2610: rdzogs rim dang sbyar na rgyu gcig pa ni spyi
NK084(yu)005:2611: bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la thams cad
NK084(yu)005:2612: byang chub sems klad par rgyu gcig pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2613: yig 'bru ni mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo
NK084(yu)005:2614: na gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu 'byung ba yi
NK084(yu)005:2615: ge a li bcu drug go //
NK084(yu)005:2616: byin gyis brlabs pa ni rang rig pa bde gshegs
NK084(yu)005:2617: kyi thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa snying ga chos
NK084(yu)005:2619: mngon sum pa ni lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo
NK084(yu)005:2620: nas me rlung g.yos nas byang sems phab pa'i dus
NK084(yu)005:2621: na bde ba mngon sum du 'char ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2622: grub mtha' dang sbyar na re re la yang chos bzhi bzhi ste gzhal bya dang /
NK084(yu)005:2625: de la rgyu gcig pa'i gzhal bya ni 'khor ba
NK084(yu)005:2626: dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad de
NK084(yu)005:2628: gtan tshigs ni rgyu skye ba med pa'i phyir stong par rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2629: 'jal tshul ni blo chen cig char du rtogs chung na rim gyis gzhal nas rtogs so //
NK084(yu)005:2630: grub mtha' ni don skye med rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2631: yig 'bru'i tshul gyis gzhal bya ni gong gi don dam de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2632: gtan tshigs ni yi ge a o am ni la sogs rnams kyis sgyu mar rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2633: 'jal tshul ni kun rdzob sgyu ma blo che chung gis rim dang cig char du rtogs pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2634: grub mtha' kun rdzob don dam du rtogs te kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin no //
NK084(yu)005:2635: byin gyis rlabs kyis gzhal bya ni gong gi don dam dang kun rdzob gnyis po rang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2636: gtan tshigs ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med du rtogs par byed pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2637: 'jal tshul ni bden pa dbyer med rtogs tshul che chung du 'dug pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2638: grub pa'i mtha' ni bden pa dbyer med du rtogs pa de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2639: mngon sum par rtogs pa'i gzhal bya ni gong gi bden pa dbyer med de rang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2640: gtan tshigs ni bar snang stong pa lta bu snang la rang bzhin med pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2641: 'jal tshul ni kun la yul du mi 'byed pa de la blo che chung du 'dug pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2642: grub mtha' ni dbyer med spyod yul dang bral ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2643: de ltar yod pa las 'dir ni bskyed rim la
NK084(yu)005:2644: dgongs pa gtso che ste bskyed rdzogs gnyis po rtogs
NK084(yu)005:2645: par byed pa la de ma yin pa rnams spang
NK084(yu)005:2646: dgos pa'o // de yang sangs rgyas dang sems can rig par rgyu gcig pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2647: rgyu de yig 'bru'i tshul +aah h+aum gis sku gsung thugs su mtshon tshul lo //
NK084(yu)005:2648: yi ge gsum gyis lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2649: de the tshom med par mngon sum du byas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2650: de ltar du rgyu gcig pa de ting dang yig 'bru rgyu ting dang /
NK084(yu)005:2651: byin gyis rlabs kun ting dang mngon sum pa lha'i
NK084(yu)005:2652: skur rtogs pa de rnams la ni rab tu rtogs
NK084(yu)005:2653: pa rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2654: de la rab tu goms par rtogs pa yis chos
NK084(yu)005:2655: thams cad rang rig tu mngon par rdzogs pa sangs
NK084(yu)005:2656: rgyas te 'khor ba las rgyal bas rgyal po che
NK084(yu)005:2657: zhes dus thams cad du mngon par rdzogs pa sangs
NK084(yu)005:2659: phyogs bcu dus bzhir rdzogs pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:2660: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs //
NK084(yu)005:2661: ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong bas //
NK084(yu)005:2662: dbang bskur mchog nyid dam pa yin //
NK084(yu)005:2663: zhes 'dir ni 'bras bu'i thob lugs rnam pa gnyis te thun mong du rig 'dzin thob pa dang /
NK084(yu)005:2664: khyad par du sku lnga lhun grub thob pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2665: de la rig 'dzin la bzhi ste rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)005:2669: de la rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin la gnyis te rgyus bsdus pa'i rnam smin dang /
NK084(yu)005:2670: 'bras bus bsdus pa las 'di 'bras bus bsdus pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2671: de'i ngo bo ni nang yid kyis lha'i sku gzugs
NK084(yu)005:2672: bzung nas phyi lus kyi ra bas sgribs pas te
NK084(yu)005:2673: dper na skor phor 'dag pa lta bu'i ste 'dag
NK084(yu)005:2674: pa nang na tsh+wa tsha'i gzugs su gnas kyang phyi'i
NK084(yu)005:2676: rang yid kyi rnam pa lha'i skur smin pas na rnam smin no //
NK084(yu)005:2677: tshe la dbang ba la bzhi ste bdud rtsi sman las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)005:2678: sgron ma rlung las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)005:2679: thabs lam rtsa rlung thig le las grub pa'i tshe dbang dang /
NK084(yu)005:2680: grol lam bskyed rdzogs las grub pa'i tshe dbang las 'di phyi ma'o //
NK084(yu)005:2681: de'i ngo bo ni mi dang lha'i cha byad du
NK084(yu)005:2682: gnas nas lo stong lnga brgya thub gzhan don du
NK084(yu)005:2683: gnas na lo brgya brgya na mar la nur nas
NK084(yu)005:2684: byis pa lo brgyad lon pa ltar yong ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2685: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin ni bzhi ste kri ya'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang /
NK084(yu)005:2690: de'i ngo bo ni rang gis rang sgoms pa'i lha'i
NK084(yu)005:2691: sku de'i lus su gnas nas bdag gzhan gyi don
NK084(yu)005:2692: byed pa'o // lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin la
NK084(yu)005:2693: gsum ste bya ba'i lhun grub dang rnal 'byor gyi
NK084(yu)005:2694: byed pa'o // lhun grub dang / ma h+aa'i lhun grub bo //
NK084(yu)005:2696: de'i ngo bo ni lus sku lnga'i ngo bor gnas /
NK084(yu)005:2697: phyogs bcur 'gro don gyi sprul pa spro bar gnas pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2698: khyad par sku lnga lhun grub la sbyor ba ni
NK084(yu)005:2699: phyogs bcu dang dus bzhir te dus bzhis bsdus pa'i
NK084(yu)005:2700: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu
NK084(yu)005:2701: thob ste / de'i ngo bo'am yon tan gang zhe na 'di rnams yin te /
NK084(yu)005:2702: sku lnga ni chos sku dang mngon par byang chub
NK084(yu)005:2703: pa'i sku dang longs sku dang sprul sku dang rdo
NK084(yu)005:2704: rje'i sku'o // gsung lnga ni skye med don gyi
NK084(yu)005:2705: gsung dang rig pa rang snang gi gsung dang dgongs
NK084(yu)005:2706: pa brda'i gsung dang snang stong tshig gi gsung dang
NK084(yu)005:2707: grags stong dbyer med kyi gsung ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2708: yon tan lnga ni gzhal yas khang dang zhing khams dang rgyan dang 'od zer dang gdan khri'o //
NK084(yu)005:2709: 'phrin las lnga ni zhi ba dang rgyas par dang dbang dang drag po dang lhun grub bo //
NK084(yu)005:2710: thugsa lnga ni chos kyi dbyings mi rtog pa'i thugs
NK084(yu)005:2711: dang me long lta bu sa le mkhyen pa dang
NK084(yu)005:2712: / mnyam pa nyid ma g.yos pa dang so sor
NK084(yu)005:2713: rtog pa ma 'gags pa dang bya ba grub pa
NK084(yu)005:2715: de lnga dbyer med pa ni sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o //
NK084(yu)005:2716: snang srid ma lus par rnam par dag pa'i sku
NK084(yu)005:2717: ni sku lnga lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas la bdag
NK084(yu)005:2718: nyid kyis de'i zhal mthonga ba ni 'bras bu de
NK084(yu)005:2719: nyid thob pa'o // de yang sgyu 'phrul rdo rje las /
NK084(yu)005:2720: rang bzhin gnas pas gzhan nas 'ong ba med //
NK084(yu)005:2721: zhen pa log pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong //
NK084(yu)005:2723: zhal mthong ba de la nyes pa dang sgrib par
NK084(yu)005:2724: gyur bas sgrib pa yin te sgrib pa de zhal
NK084(yu)005:2725: mthong nas dbang bskur bas sgrib pa dag ste sangs
NK084(yu)005:2726: rgyas kyi dgongs pa'i mchog nyid dam pa thob pa
NK084(yu)005:2727: yin no // gsum pa mjug gi don la gsum
NK084(yu)005:2728: ste bstan bcos brtsam pa'i dge ba bsngo ba dang
NK084(yu)005:2729: yin no // / slob dpon gang gis brtsam pa'i mdzad byang /
NK084(yu)005:2730: lo pan gang gis bsgyur ba'i 'gyur byang ngo //
NK084(yu)005:2732: bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bsdus pa yis //
NK084(yu)005:2733: bsod nams bdag gis gang thob pa //
NK084(yu)005:2734: dpal chen kun bzang sku gsung thugs //
NK084(yu)005:2735: sems can kun gyis thob par shog /ces khro bo
NK084(yu)005:2736: sgrub pa'i thabs 'di rgyud gsang ba snying po las
NK084(yu)005:2738: de ltar brtsam pa yis bsod nams sangs rgyas gsang
NK084(yu)005:2739: ba bdag gis gang thob pa de dge bar bsngo
NK084(yu)005:2740: ste gang zhe na bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po
NK084(yu)005:2741: kun tu bzang po'i sku gsung thugs yang dag pa
NK084(yu)005:2742: de khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad kun gyis
NK084(yu)005:2743: kyang thob par shog cig ces smon lam btabs pa'o
NK084(yu)005:2745: de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa rgyan slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
NK084(yu)005:2746: zhes de kho na nyid ni don dam pa ste
NK084(yu)005:2747: sku lnga lhun grub nyid dpal he ru ka'i don
NK084(yu)005:2748: yin pa'o // de kho na gdul bya lam pa'i don du skur snang ba'o //
NK084(yu)005:2749: snang ba de kho na mi bslu nges pas don dama pa yin nges pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2750: de ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rgyan du gyur
NK084(yu)005:2751: pa ste sgoms na legs pa 'byung zhing mdzes pas
NK084(yu)005:2752: na rgyan no // slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang ba
NK084(yu)005:2753: ni mdzad pa po'i mtshan dang rdzogs so zhes pa
NK084(yu)005:2756: rgya gar gyi pan+di ta sangs rgyas gsang ba de
NK084(yu)005:2757: nyid dang bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bran
NK084(yu)005:2758: ka mu ri ta dang b+has man+dzu sh+ri war mas
NK084(yu)005:2759: ba sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK084(yu)005:2761: 'di ltar 'bad pa'i dge tshogs rin chen rdul //
NK084(yu)005:2762: gcig tu spungs pa'i lhun po bltar mi mngon //
NK084(yu)005:2763: ye shes 'od zer d+r+wa bas brgyan pa yi //
NK084(yu)005:2764: bstan bcos chen po'i mchan tig bkod pa'i mthus //
NK084(yu)005:2765: rgyal bstan spyi dang nges gsang snying po yi //
NK084(yu)005:2766: bshad dang sgrub pa dar zhing rgyas pa dang //
NK084(yu)005:2767: rim gnyis la brtson rig 'dzin bzhi mthar phyin //
NK084(yu)005:2768: 'gro kun he ru ka dpal 'thob phyir bsngo //
NK084(yu)005:2769: nag po'i phyogs 'joms dkar po'i snang ba rgyas //
NK084(yu)005:2770: bstan da nga bstan 'dzin dbu 'phang rab mtho zhing //
NK084(yu)005:2771: phyogs las rnam rgyal lha yi rnga sgra yis //
NK084(yu)005:2772: 'jig rten kun tu khyab pa'i bkra shis shog //
NK084(yu)005:2773: ces khro bo dam pa rgyan la dbus gru smon
NK084(yu)005:2774: lam sed+ge'i mchan tig la gzhi byas bsdus don rang
NK084(yu)005:2775: blos gang dpog bkod de 'jam dbyangs chos kyi blo
NK084(yu)005:2776: gros pas gsal bar byas pa'i lhan cig byed rkyen
NK084(yu)005:2777: mgo tsha mkhan gzhan phan bzang pos bgyis pa dge
